original: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas chos rnams ma 'dres par bstan pa rab tu shes so //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas chos rnams ma 'dres par bstan pa rab tu shes so //
translated: By the analytical knowledge of the etymologies, one knows how to teach the Dharmas without confusing them.

original: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas chos rnams kyi mthun pa'i rgyun rgyun mi 'chad pa rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas chos rnams kyi mthun pa'i rgyun rgyun mi 'chad pa rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: By the analytical knowledge of eloquence, one knows how to teach the Dharmas in a continuous stream that is in accord with the inclinations of others.

original: de la ma 'dres par bstan pa ni su ming go @240b bar 'gyur ba de la de nyid kyis ston gyi gzhan gyis ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de la ma 'dres par bstan pa ni su ming go @240b bar 'gyur ba de la de nyid kyis ston gyi gzhan gyis ma yin pa'o //
translated: Therein, “to teach without confusing” means to teach each thing by its own name, not by another’s name.

original: mthun pa'i rgyun rgyun mi 'chad pa zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs dag gi rgyun zad mi shes pa ste /
analyzed: mthun pa'i rgyun rgyun mi 'chad pa zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs dag gi rgyun zad mi shes pa ste /
translated: “To teach in a continuous stream that is in accord with the inclinations of others” means to teach without interruption by means of synonyms.

original: rnam grangs mang pos don de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam grangs mang pos don de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: For the sake of teaching that very meaning, one should use many synonyms.

original: de la spyi'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: de la spyi'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: Therein, the general characteristics are also fourfold.

original: chos thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid dang / 'dus byas thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid dang / chos thams cad kyi btags pa'i spyi'i mtshan nyid dang / btags pa'i btags pa spyi'i mtshan nyid de gang gi phyir /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid dang / 'dus byas thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid dang / chos thams cad kyi btags pa'i spyi'i mtshan nyid dang / btags pa'i btags pa spyi'i mtshan nyid de gang gi phyir /
translated: The general characteristics of all phenomena, the general characteristics of all conditioned things, the general characteristics of the designations of all phenomena, and the general characteristics of the designations of designations.

original: gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pas chos rnams kyi dngos po med pa'i lus rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pas chos rnams kyi dngos po med pa'i lus rab tu shes so //
translated: Moreover, through the correct understanding of phenomena, one understands the non-existence of the body of phenomena.

original: don so so yang dag par rig pas chos rnams kyi 'byung ba dang 'jig pa rab tu shes so //🔽nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas chos thams cad kyi btags pa rgyun 'chad pa med par chos ston to //
analyzed: don so so yang dag par rig pas chos rnams kyi 'byung ba dang 'jig pa rab tu shes so // nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas chos thams cad kyi btags pa rgyun 'chad pa med par chos ston to //
translated: Through the correct understanding of meaning, one understands the arising and destruction of phenomena.🔽Through the correct understanding of language, one teaches the Dharma without interruption of the designations of all phenomena.

original: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas ji ltar btags pa bzhin du 'khrugs pa med par mtha' yas pas chos ston to zhes gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas ji ltar btags pa bzhin du 'khrugs pa med par mtha' yas pas chos ston to zhes gsungs pa ste /
translated: Through the correct understanding of eloquence, one teaches the Dharma with infinite eloquence without confusion, just as designated.

original: mi rtag pa nyid kyi sgo nas chos la bdag med pa la 'jug pas spyi'i mtshan nyid gnyis pas ni snga ma shes pa'i yul du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyi sgo nas chos la bdag med pa la 'jug pas spyi'i mtshan nyid gnyis pas ni snga ma shes pa'i yul du 'gyur ro //
translated: The second general characteristic is the object of knowledge of the former, because one enters into the selflessness of phenomena by way of impermanence.

original: de la chos thams cad kyi btags pa rgyun 'chad pa med pa zhes bya ba ni chos gzhan gyi btags pa'i chos gzhan la mi ston pa'o //
analyzed: de la chos thams cad kyi btags pa rgyun 'chad pa med pa zhes bya ba ni chos gzhan gyi btags pa'i chos gzhan la mi ston pa'o //
translated: The uninterrupted designation of all phenomena means that one phenomenon is not taught as another phenomenon.

original: ji ltar btags pa bzhin du 'khrugs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs gzhan dag gis sngar btags pa dang mi 'gal ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar btags pa bzhin du 'khrugs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs gzhan dag gis sngar btags pa dang mi 'gal ba'o //
translated: The non-disturbance of designation as it is means that it is not contradictory to the former designations by other enumerations.

original: tshul gyi mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: tshul gyi mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The characteristics of method are also of four kinds:

original: byung ba'i tshul gyi mtshan nyid dang / byung ba dang ma byung ba'i tshul gyi mtshan nyid dang / btags pa dang rdzas kyi tshul gyi mtshan nyid dang / brjod pa'i dngos po'i tshul gyi mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: byung ba'i tshul gyi mtshan nyid dang / byung ba dang ma byung ba'i tshul gyi mtshan nyid dang / btags pa dang rdzas kyi tshul gyi mtshan nyid dang / brjod pa'i dngos po'i tshul gyi mtshan nyid de /
translated: the characteristic of the method of origination, the characteristic of the method of origination and non-origination, the characteristic of the method of designation and substance, and the characteristic of the method of the expressed thing.

original: gang gi phyir gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pas da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam par dbye ba rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pas da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam par dbye ba rab tu shes so //
translated: Because of this, moreover, through the knowledge of the teaching, one knows the classification of present phenomena.

original: don so so yang dag par rig pas 'das pa dang ; ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams kyi rnam par dbye ba rab tu shes so //
analyzed: don so so yang dag par rig pas 'das pa dang ; ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams kyi rnam par dbye ba rab tu shes so //
translated: Through the knowledge of the meaning, one knows the classification of past and future phenomena.

original: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ma 'dres bar chos ston to //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ma 'dres bar chos ston to //
translated: Through the knowledge of language, one teaches the Dharma unmixed with regard to past, future, and present.

original: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas dus re re zhing chos snang ba mu med par chos ston to zhes @241a * //
analyzed: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas dus re re zhing chos snang ba mu med par chos ston to zhes @241a * //
translated: Through the knowledge of brilliance, one teaches the Dharma with an uninterrupted brilliance of the Dharma at every moment.

original: gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: gsungs pa ste /
translated: It is said.

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ni da ltar byung ba'i rigs su gtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ni da ltar byung ba'i rigs su gtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the past and future are included in the present type,

original: rigs des bsdus par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs des bsdus par rig par bya'o //
translated: they are to be known as included in that type.

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa la ltos nas /
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa la ltos nas /
translated: In dependence on the past and future,

original: da ltar byung ba la da ltar byung ba nyid du shes te /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba la da ltar byung ba nyid du shes te /
translated: the present is known as the present.

original: de ltar de ni shes pa'i yul yin no /
analyzed: de ltar de ni shes pa'i yul yin no /
translated: Thus, it is the object of knowledge.

original: brjod pa'i dngos po'i tshul gyi mtshan nyid ni dus gsum las lhag pa med par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: brjod pa'i dngos po'i tshul gyi mtshan nyid ni dus gsum las lhag pa med par rig par bya'o //
translated: The characteristic of the mode of expression should be understood as not exceeding the three times.

original: chos kyi snang ba mu med pa zhes bya ba la snang ba ni rnam grangs su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyi snang ba mu med pa zhes bya ba la snang ba ni rnam grangs su rig par bya'o //
translated: The Dharma illumination is limitless. Illumination should be understood as a synonym.

original: bstan pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: bstan pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The characteristic of teaching is also of four kinds:

original: mdo la sogs pa bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang / de'i rnam par bshad pa bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rjes su mthun par bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang // 'tsham par bstan pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: mdo la sogs pa bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang / de'i rnam par bshad pa bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rjes su mthun par bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang // 'tsham par bstan pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: the characteristic of teaching the sūtras, etc. , the characteristic of teaching their commentaries, the characteristic of teaching in a manner that is suitable, and the characteristic of teaching in a manner that is appropriate.

original: gang gi phyir gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pas chos rab tu dbye ba rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pas chos rab tu dbye ba rab tu shes so //
translated: Moreover, through the correct discrimination of the Dharma, one understands the classification of the Dharma.

original: don so so yang dag par rig pas don rab tu dbye ba rab tu shes so //
analyzed: don so so yang dag par rig pas don rab tu dbye ba rab tu shes so //
translated: Through the correct discrimination of meaning, one understands the classification of meaning.

original: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas sgra bzhin du bstan pas chos ston to //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas sgra bzhin du bstan pas chos ston to //
translated: Through the correct discrimination of language, one teaches the Dharma by means of language that is suitable.🔽Through the correct discrimination of eloquence, one teaches the Dharma without fear.

original: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas chos ston to zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas chos ston to zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: By means of the analytical knowledge of eloquence, he teaches the Dharma by knowing the thoughts of sentient beings.

original: de la sgra bzhin du bstan pa ni skad ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de la sgra bzhin du bstan pa ni skad ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa'o //
translated: Here, teaching according to the letter means teaching according to the language.

original: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa ni gang gi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / su dpe'i rnam grangs ji snyed kyis khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa ni gang gi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / su dpe'i rnam grangs ji snyed kyis khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Knowing the thoughts of sentient beings means knowing the thoughts of sentient beings and how much of the analogy they can understand.

original: shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The characteristics of knowledge are also of four kinds:

original: mngon sum du shes pa dang / lkog tu gyur pa shes pa dang / 'thob pa'i thabs shes pa dang / 'thob pa shes pa ste /
analyzed: mngon sum du shes pa dang / lkog tu gyur pa shes pa dang / 'thob pa'i thabs shes pa dang / 'thob pa shes pa ste /
translated: knowledge of direct perception, knowledge of the hidden, knowledge of the means of attainment, and knowledge of attainment.

original: gang gi phyir gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pas chos shes pas rnam par dbye ba ma 'dres pa la mkhas pa rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pas chos shes pas rnam par dbye ba ma 'dres pa la mkhas pa rab tu shes so //
translated: Moreover, by means of the analytical knowledge of dharmas, he knows the skill in the unmixed classification of dharmas through knowing dharmas.

original: don so so yang dag par rig pas rjes su rtog pa'i shes pas de bzhin du rnam par gzhag pa rab tu shes so //
analyzed: don so so yang dag par rig pas rjes su rtog pa'i shes pas de bzhin du rnam par gzhag pa rab tu shes so //
translated: By means of the analytical knowledge of the meaning, one understands the presentation of the teachings by means of the subsequent knowledge.

original: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas kun rdzob shes pas ston pas ston te /
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas kun rdzob shes pas ston pas ston te /
translated: By means of the analytical knowledge of language, one teaches by means of conventional knowledge.

original: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas don rnam par shes pa la mkhas pas chos ston to zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas don rnam par shes pa la mkhas pas chos ston to zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: By means of the analytical knowledge of brilliance, one teaches the Dharma by means of the skill in knowing the meaning.

original: de la chos shes pas rnam par dbye ba ma 'dres pa la mkhas pa ni chos shes pas bden pa rnam par dbye ba phyin ci ma log pa la @241b mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: de la chos shes pas rnam par dbye ba ma 'dres pa la mkhas pa ni chos shes pas bden pa rnam par dbye ba phyin ci ma log pa la @241b mkhas pa'o //
translated: Among them, the skill in the unmixed divisions by means of the knowledge of the teaching is the skill in the undistorted division of the truths by means of the knowledge of the teaching.

original: rjes su rtog pa'i shes pas de bzhin du rnam par gzhag pa ni rjes su rtog pa'i shes pas 'di ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan yang de bzhin du rnam par 'jog pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su rtog pa'i shes pas de bzhin du rnam par gzhag pa ni rjes su rtog pa'i shes pas 'di ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan yang de bzhin du rnam par 'jog pa'o //
translated: The presentation of the teachings by means of the subsequent knowledge is the presentation of the teachings by means of the subsequent knowledge in accordance with how it is.

original: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas don dam pa shes pa la mkhas pa ni rnam grangs ma nor ba la spobs pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas don dam pa shes pa la mkhas pa ni rnam grangs ma nor ba la spobs pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the skill in knowing the ultimate through the analytical knowledges is the eloquence of unerring enumeration.

original: mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The characteristic of being without conceit is also fourfold:

original: don dam pa'i bden pa la mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa dang / kun rdzob kyi bden pa la mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa dang / bstan pa snyan pa la mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa dang / bstan pa bla na med pa la mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa ste /
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa la mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa dang / kun rdzob kyi bden pa la mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa dang / bstan pa snyan pa la mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa dang / bstan pa bla na med pa la mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa ste /
translated: being without conceit about the ultimate truth, being without conceit about the conventional truth, being without conceit about pleasant teachings, and being without conceit about unsurpassed teachings.

original: gang gi phyir gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pas chos tshul gcig pa mi 'khrugs pa rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pas chos tshul gcig pa mi 'khrugs pa rab tu shes so //
translated: Moreover, through the analytical knowledge of phenomena, one knows the undifferentiated single mode of phenomena.

original: don so so yang dag par rig pas phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / bden pa dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa khong du chud par bya ba 'jug go //
analyzed: don so so yang dag par rig pas phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / bden pa dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa khong du chud par bya ba 'jug go //
translated: The knowledge of the reality of meaning is applied to the understanding of the aggregates, elements, sense-media, truths, and dependent origination.🔽The knowledge of the reality of language is taught by the sweet sounds of letters that are desired by all beings.

original: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas 'gro ba thams cad smon pa'i sgra dbyangs shin tu snyan pa'i yi ge rnams kyis ston to //🔽spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas phyi phyir zhing snang ba mu med pas ston to zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas 'gro ba thams cad smon pa'i sgra dbyangs shin tu snyan pa'i yi ge rnams kyis ston to // spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas phyi phyir zhing snang ba mu med pas ston to zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: The knowledge of the reality of eloquence teaches by means of the endless appearance of the Dharma.

original: de la tshul gcig pa mi 'khrugs pa ni bdag ni bdag med par shes par byed do //🔽bdag gi bdag med pa rtogs pa'o snyam pa la sogs pas chos la bdag med pa la mi 'khrugs pa'o //🔽phung po la sogs pa la mkhas pa ni bdag med par rab tu rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la tshul gcig pa mi 'khrugs pa ni bdag ni bdag med par shes par byed do // bdag gi bdag med pa rtogs pa'o snyam pa la sogs pas chos la bdag med pa la mi 'khrugs pa'o // phung po la sogs pa la mkhas pa ni bdag med par rab tu rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: Among these, the single method is unshakability. One should understand that the self is selfless.

analyzed: des na de ni shes pa'i yul nyid yin no //
translated: One should understand that the self is selfless. One should understand that the self is selfless. One should understand that the self is selfless. original: phung po la sogs pa la mkhas pas ni /
analyzed: phung po la sogs pa la mkhas pas ni /
translated: By means of the skill in aggregates, etc.,

original: ril po gcig pu'i bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / mi 'dra ba la rgyur 'dzin pa dang / za ba por 'dzin pa dang / byed pa por 'dzin pa'i gnyen por go rims bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: ril po gcig pu'i bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / mi 'dra ba la rgyur 'dzin pa dang / za ba por 'dzin pa dang / byed pa por 'dzin pa'i gnyen por go rims bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: one should understand the remedies for the grasping of a self which is a single whole, for the grasping of a self which is the substratum of dissimilar qualities, for the grasping of a self which is the experiencer, and for the grasping of a self which is the agent.

original: theg pa dman pa dang / gya nom pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: theg pa dman pa dang / gya nom pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The inferior vehicle and the excellent vehicle also have four characteristics:

original: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rigs kyi mtshan nyid dang / rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid dang / yid la byed pa'i mtshan nyid de gang gi phyir /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rigs kyi mtshan nyid dang / rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid dang / yid la byed pa'i mtshan nyid de gang gi phyir /
translated: the characteristic of objective support, the characteristic of spiritual lineage, the characteristic of liberation, and the characteristic of mental attention.

original: gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pas theg pa gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba tha dad pa med par rab tu shes so//
analyzed: gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pas theg pa gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba tha dad pa med par rab tu shes so//
translated: Moreover, by means of the analytical knowledge of the Dharma, one understands the non-differentiation of the correct orientation towards the one vehicle.

original: @242a * // don so so yang dag par rig pas theg pa rab tu rnam par phye ba rnam pa tha dad par rab tu shes so //
analyzed: @242a * // don so so yang dag par rig pas theg pa rab tu rnam par phye ba rnam pa tha dad par rab tu shes so //
translated: By means of the analytical knowledge of the meaning, one understands the differentiation of the vehicle which is well divided.

original: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas theg pa thams cad tha mi dad par ston to //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas theg pa thams cad tha mi dad par ston to //
translated: The analytical knowledge of the power of expression teaches that all vehicles are not different.

original: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas theg pa re re la yang chos kyi snang ba mu med par ston to zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas theg pa re re la yang chos kyi snang ba mu med par ston to zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: The analytical knowledge of eloquence teaches that in each vehicle the light of the Dharma is limitless.

original: de la yang dag par gzhol ba tha dad pa med pa ni dmigs pa tha dad pa med pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de la yang dag par gzhol ba tha dad pa med pa ni dmigs pa tha dad pa med pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: Therein, the non-differentiation of correct application should be known as the non-differentiation of objective supports.

original: theg pa thams cad tha mi dad par ston zhes bya ba ni rnam par grol ba thun mong pas ci nas skrag par mi byed pa'o //
analyzed: theg pa thams cad tha mi dad par ston zhes bya ba ni rnam par grol ba thun mong pas ci nas skrag par mi byed pa'o //
translated: It teaches that all vehicles are not different means that by the common liberation, one should not be frightened.

original: chos kyi snang ba mu med pa zhes bya ba la snang ba ni rnam grangs su rig par bya ste /
analyzed: chos kyi snang ba mu med pa zhes bya ba la snang ba ni rnam grangs su rig par bya ste /
translated: As for the limitless light of the Dharma, light should be known as a synonym.

original: ji lta bus gdul bya rnams la theg pa so so rnam par grol ba thob par byed pa'i tshul bzhin yid la byed pa rnam pa du ma rab tu 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ji lta bus gdul bya rnams la theg pa so so rnam par grol ba thob par byed pa'i tshul bzhin yid la byed pa rnam pa du ma rab tu 'byung ngo //
translated: In whatever way, for those to be trained, the attainment of the liberation of each vehicle arises, the correct mental activity arises in many forms.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The characteristics of the Bodhisattvabhumi are also fourfold:

original: mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang / thabs nye bar sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sgo du ma la 'dzud pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang / thabs nye bar sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sgo du ma la 'dzud pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: the characteristic of clear realization, the characteristic of teaching, the characteristic of the means of accomplishment, and the characteristic of the entrance into the many doors.

original: gang gi phyir gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / ye shes kyi spyod pa dang / chos kyi spyod pa thams cad ye shes kyis khong du chud par bya ba thams cad la 'jug go //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / ye shes kyi spyod pa dang / chos kyi spyod pa thams cad ye shes kyis khong du chud par bya ba thams cad la 'jug go //
translated: Moreover, by means of the analytical knowledge of the teaching, the bodhisattva penetrates all the practices of the bodhisattva, the practices of knowledge, and the practices of Dharma, as well as all the realizations of knowledge.

original: don so so yang dag par rig pas sa bcu rnam par dgod pa dang / bstan pa rab tu rnam par dbye ba la 'jug go //
analyzed: don so so yang dag par rig pas sa bcu rnam par dgod pa dang / bstan pa rab tu rnam par dbye ba la 'jug go //
translated: By means of the analytical knowledge of the meaning, he enters into the arrangement of the ten stages and the classification of the teaching.

original: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas sa ji lta ba bzhin du lam nye bar sgrub pa ma 'dres par ston to //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas sa ji lta ba bzhin du lam nye bar sgrub pa ma 'dres par ston to //
translated: By means of the analytical knowledge of inspired speech, he teaches the stages as they are, without confusing the means of accomplishment.

original: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas re re la yang rnam pa mu med par ston to zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas re re la yang rnam pa mu med par ston to zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: and with the analytical knowledge of ready speech, he teaches each of them in an infinite number of ways.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni ye shes dang / chos kyi spyod pa gnyis kyis ston te /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni ye shes dang / chos kyi spyod pa gnyis kyis ston te /
translated: The bodhisattva's practice is taught by the two practices of knowledge and Dharma.

original: de ni ye shes dmigs pa dang bcas pa smos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni ye shes dmigs pa dang bcas pa smos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the knowledge is mentioned with its objective reference.

original: sa bcu rnam par dgod pa ni sems kyis so ;
analyzed: sa bcu rnam par dgod pa ni sems kyis so ;
translated: The ten stages are set forth by the mind.

original: / bstan pa ni tshig gis yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: / bstan pa ni tshig gis yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The teaching should be understood as being by means of words.

original: sa ji lta ba bzhin du lam nye bar sgrub pa ma 'dres par ston to zhes bya ba ni gdams ngag phyin ci ma log pa'o //
analyzed: sa ji lta ba bzhin du lam nye bar sgrub pa ma 'dres par ston to zhes bya ba ni gdams ngag phyin ci ma log pa'o //
translated: The path is taught in an unmixed way according to the stages.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The characteristics of the stage of the Tathāgata are also fourfold:

original: chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid dang / gzugs kyi sku'i @242b mtshan nyid dang / mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bstan pa'i mtshan nyid de gang gi phyir /
analyzed: chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid dang / gzugs kyi sku'i @242b mtshan nyid dang / mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bstan pa'i mtshan nyid de gang gi phyir /
translated: the characteristic of the Dharma Body, the characteristic of the Form Body, the characteristic of realization, and the characteristic of teaching.

original: gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu khong du chud par bya ba la 'jug go //
analyzed: gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu khong du chud par bya ba la 'jug go //
translated: Moreover, through the correct understanding of the Dharma, one enters into the realization that all the Tathagatas have the same nature.

original: don so so yang dag par rig pas dus dang / dngos po dang mtshan rnam par dbye ba tha dad pa khong du chud par bya ba rab tu shes so //
analyzed: don so so yang dag par rig pas dus dang / dngos po dang mtshan rnam par dbye ba tha dad pa khong du chud par bya ba rab tu shes so //
translated: Through the correct understanding of the meaning, one knows how to understand the distinctions of time, thing, and name.

original: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud pa bzhin du rnam par dbye ba bstan pas ston to //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud pa bzhin du rnam par dbye ba bstan pas ston to //
translated: Through the correct understanding of language, one teaches by means of the distinctions of the teaching, just as one has realized them.

original: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas chos kyi tshig re re la yang bskal pa mtha' yas par rgyun mi 'chad par ston to zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas chos kyi tshig re re la yang bskal pa mtha' yas par rgyun mi 'chad par ston to zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: Through the correct understanding of eloquence, one teaches each word of the Dharma for endless aeons without ever running out.

original: de la dus ni bskal pa gang la sangs rgyas gang 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de la dus ni bskal pa gang la sangs rgyas gang 'byung ba'o //
translated: Here, time is the aeon in which a Buddha appears.

original: dngos po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na sku ci 'dra bas so //
analyzed: dngos po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na sku ci 'dra bas so //
translated: The thing is the Buddha-field, and the kind of body.

original: mtshan ni ming gang gis gang rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ni ming gang gis gang rtogs pa'o //
translated: The name is the name by which one is known.

original: ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud pa bzhin zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcu'i dbang du byas nas gang gis mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud pa bzhin zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcu'i dbang du byas nas gang gis mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan par bya'o //
translated: As it is fully understood means that it should be taught just as it is fully understood by the ten powers of the Buddha.

original: mdzad pa'i sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: mdzad pa'i sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: The characteristic of accomplishment of activity is also fourfold:

original: mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang / de mi zad pa'i mtshan nyid de gang gi phyir /
analyzed: mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rnam par gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid dang / bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang / de mi zad pa'i mtshan nyid de gang gi phyir /
translated: the characteristic of full realization, the characteristic of establishment, the characteristic of teaching, and the characteristic of its inexhaustibility.

original: gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / thugs rje chen po dang / so so yang dag par rig pas sbyor ba dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / thugs rje chen po dang / so so yang dag par rig pas sbyor ba dang /
translated: Moreover, through the correct understanding of phenomena, the Tathāgata's speech, powers, fearlessnesses, buddha qualities, great compassion, and correct understanding are applied.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba rab tu shes so //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba rab tu shes so //
translated: By turning the wheel of Dharma, he knows how to realize the pristine awareness of omniscience.

original: don so so yang dag par rig pas sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / bsam pa ji lta ba dang / dbang po ji lta ba dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab tu shes so //
analyzed: don so so yang dag par rig pas sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / bsam pa ji lta ba dang / dbang po ji lta ba dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab tu shes so //
translated: By means of the correct understanding of meanings, he knows the Tathāgata’s scriptures in accordance with the eighty-four thousand kinds of conduct of sentient beings, their inclinations, faculties, and aspirations.

original: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs rjes su bsgrags pas ston to //🔽spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas de bzhin @243a * //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs rjes su bsgrags pas ston to // spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas de bzhin @243a * //
translated: By means of the correct understanding of etymologies, he teaches by proclaiming the Tathāgata’s undistorted scriptures in accordance with the conduct of all sentient beings.

original: gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la mos pas chos ston to zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la mos pas chos ston to zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: By means of the correct understanding of eloquence, he teaches the Dharma by means of the Tathāgata’s pristine awareness, which is the light of conduct.

original: de la gsung ni tshig gang gis ston pa'o //
analyzed: de la gsung ni tshig gang gis ston pa'o //
translated: Here, “speech” is the words by which he teaches.

original: stobs ni gang thob pas so //
analyzed: stobs ni gang thob pas so //
translated: “Power” is what he has attained.

original: mi 'jigs pa ni gang gis mu stegs can rnams zil gyis gnon pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa ni gang gis mu stegs can rnams zil gyis gnon pa'o //
translated: Fearlessness is that by which he overwhelms the heterodox.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gang dag gis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams zil gyis non pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gang dag gis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams zil gyis non pa'o //
translated: The Buddha natures are the unshared qualities of a Buddha by which he overwhelms the disciples and hermit buddhas.

original: thugs rje chen po ni gang gis shin tu ston pa'o //
analyzed: thugs rje chen po ni gang gis shin tu ston pa'o //
translated: Great compassion is that by which he teaches.

original: so so yang dag par rig pas sbyor ba ni gang la brten nas ston pa'o //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pas sbyor ba ni gang la brten nas ston pa'o //
translated: The application of analytical knowledges is that on the basis of which he teaches.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni 'chad pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni 'chad pa'o //
translated: The setting in motion of the wheel of the Dharma is his teaching.

original: de dag thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows all of these in order to comprehend the knowledge of all things.

original: bsam pa ji lta ba zhes bya ba ni 'dir khams 'di lta bur yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bsam pa ji lta ba zhes bya ba ni 'dir khams 'di lta bur yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The phrase “in accordance with their aspirations” means that he knows their dispositions to be such and such.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku ste /
translated: The sphere of activity of the light of the knowledge of the Tathāgata is the Dharma body of the Tathāgata.

original: de ni sems can gyi don spyod pas spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de ni sems can gyi don spyod pas spyod pa'o //
translated: It is the sphere of activity because it is the activity for the benefit of sentient beings.

original: tha mi dad pas dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: tha mi dad pas dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: It is a mandala because it is not different.

original: de la mos pas byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa zad mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: de la mos pas byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa zad mi shes pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattva's inexhaustible eloquence is based on that.

original: de la smra ba po phun sum tshogs pa ni rnam pa bzhis yongs su bstan te /
analyzed: de la smra ba po phun sum tshogs pa ni rnam pa bzhis yongs su bstan te /
translated: The perfection of the speaker is taught by four topics:

original: gzungs phun sum tshogs pa dang / rab tu ston pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dris pa lan 'debs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'dzin pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs phun sum tshogs pa dang / rab tu ston pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / dris pa lan 'debs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'dzin pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: the perfection of retention, the perfection of teaching, the perfection of answering questions, and the perfection of embracing.

original: de la gzungs phun sum tshogs pa ni gzungs rnam pa bcu ste /
analyzed: de la gzungs phun sum tshogs pa ni gzungs rnam pa bcu ste /
translated: The perfection of retention is the ten retentions.

original: don gyi gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: don gyi gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The retention of meaning is the retention of the meaning of the Dharma.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes de lta bu la mkhas pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa thob pa /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes de lta bu la mkhas pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa thob pa /
translated: O son of the victors, the bodhisattva who is skilled in such knowledge of correct discrimination, who has attained the ninth bodhisattva stage,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod thob pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod thob pa /
translated: who has attained the treasury of the Tathagata's Dharma,

original: chos smra ba chen po byed pa ni don dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob pa yin te zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: chos smra ba chen po byed pa ni don dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob pa yin te zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: who is a great Dharma teacher, has attained the retention of meaningful Dharma.

original: tshig gi gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: tshig gi gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The retention of words is so called because

original: chos dang ldan pa'i gzungs zhes gsungs pa'o //🔽mngon par shes pa'i gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: chos dang ldan pa'i gzungs zhes gsungs pa'o // mngon par shes pa'i gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
translated: it is the retention of the Dharma.🔽The retention of superknowledge is so called because

original: ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs zhes gsungs pa'o //🔽'od zer rab tu gtong ba'i gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs zhes gsungs pa'o // 'od zer rab tu gtong ba'i gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
translated: it is the retention of the accomplishment of intuition.🔽The retention of the emission of light is so called because

original: snang ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: snang ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: it is the retention of illumination.

original: phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod pa'i gzungs ni gang gi @243b phyir ;
analyzed: phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcod pa'i gzungs ni gang gi @243b phyir ;
translated: The retention of the destruction of adversaries is so called because

original: blo gros bzang po dang ldan pa'i gzungs zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: blo gros bzang po dang ldan pa'i gzungs zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: it is the retention of good intellect.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba mi 'dogs pa'i sems can la phan gdags pa nye bar sgrub pa'i gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba mi 'dogs pa'i sems can la phan gdags pa nye bar sgrub pa'i gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The retention of the accomplishment of the benefit of sentient beings who do not aspire to worship the Tathagata is so called because

original: nor dang ldan pa'i gzungs zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: nor dang ldan pa'i gzungs zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: it is the retention of wealth.

original: theg pa chen po la zhum pa'i sems can yang dag par gzengs bstod pa'i gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: theg pa chen po la zhum pa'i sems can yang dag par gzengs bstod pa'i gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The retention of the encouragement of sentient beings who are fainthearted about the Great Vehicle is so called because🔽it is the retention of the Great Vehicle.

original: gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: The dhāraṇī of splendor.

original: thogs pa med pa spobs pa'i gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa spobs pa'i gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The dhāraṇī of unimpeded eloquence, because

original: chags pa med pa'i sgo'i gzungs zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: chags pa med pa'i sgo'i gzungs zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: the dhāraṇī of the door of nonattachment is taught.

original: spobs pa mi zad pa'i gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: spobs pa mi zad pa'i gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The dhāraṇī of inexhaustible eloquence, because

original: mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: the dhāraṇī of infinity is taught.

original: don sna tshogs la spobs pa'i gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: don sna tshogs la spobs pa'i gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The dhāraṇī of eloquence in various meanings, because

original: don sna tshogs la spobs pa'i gzungs thob pa yin no zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: don sna tshogs la spobs pa'i gzungs thob pa yin no zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: the dhāraṇī of eloquence in various meanings is taught.

original: de la gzungs kyi sgo de dag la sogs pa gzungs kyi sgo grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu tshang pa thob ste /
analyzed: de la gzungs kyi sgo de dag la sogs pa gzungs kyi sgo grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu tshang pa thob ste /
translated: There, having attained these dhāraṇī gateways and so forth, the complete ten hundred thousand countless dhāraṇī gateways are attained.

original: gzungs kyi sgo grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu dang ldan pa'i sgra skad kyi yan lag la mkhas pas de snyed du tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i spobs pa rnam par phye ba'i sgos chos ston to //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu dang ldan pa'i sgra skad kyi yan lag la mkhas pas de snyed du tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i spobs pa rnam par phye ba'i sgos chos ston to //
translated: With the skill in the branches of sound and language endowed with the ten hundred thousand countless dhāraṇī gateways, through the gateway of the analysis of immeasurable eloquence, the Dharma is taught.

original: de de ltar gzungs kyi sgo grangs med pa 'bum phrag tshad med pa dag gis /
analyzed: de de ltar gzungs kyi sgo grangs med pa 'bum phrag tshad med pa dag gis /
translated: In this way, through countless hundreds of thousands of dhāraṇī gateways,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa dag las chos nyan cing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa dag las chos nyan cing /
translated: he hears the Dharma from countless Blessed Buddhas.

original: thos nas kyang brjed par mi byed de /
analyzed: thos nas kyang brjed par mi byed de /
translated: Having heard it, he does not forget it.

original: ji skad thos pa yang tshad med par rnam par phye nas ston to //
analyzed: ji skad thos pa yang tshad med par rnam par phye nas ston to //
translated: He teaches it immeasurably, having analyzed it according to what he has heard.

original: de de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las gzungs kyi sgo grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcus chos kun chub par byed de /
analyzed: de de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las gzungs kyi sgo grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcus chos kun chub par byed de /
translated: He masters all the Dharma through ten hundred thousand countless dhāraṇī gateways from a single Tathāgata.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa dag las kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig las ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa dag las kyang de bzhin no //
translated: Just as he does with one Tathāgata, he does the same with limitless Tathāgatas.

original: de smon pa tsam gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las chos kyi sgo snang ba ches mang du yang dag par 'dzin gyi /
analyzed: de smon pa tsam gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las chos kyi sgo snang ba ches mang du yang dag par 'dzin gyi /
translated: Through mere aspiration, he receives the illumination of the Dharma door from the perfect Buddha in even greater abundance.

original: nyan thos shin tu mang du thos pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: nyan thos shin tu mang du thos pa dang ldan pa /
translated: The śrāvaka has great learning.

original: thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs thob pas ni bskal pa 'bum du gzung ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de ltar mi zin to zhes bya ba ni smra ba po phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs thob pas ni bskal pa 'bum du gzung ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de ltar mi zin to zhes bya ba ni smra ba po phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: And by attaining the retention of what is heard, he is able to retain it by the power of memory for a hundred thousand eons.

original: rab tu ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: rab tu ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The perfection of teaching is as follows:

original: de de lta bu'i gzungs thob cing spobs pa thob pas chos kyi gtam bya @244a * //
analyzed: de de lta bu'i gzungs thob cing spobs pa thob pas chos kyi gtam bya @244a * //
translated: Because he has attained such retention and eloquence, when he wishes to give a Dharma discourse,

original: ba'i phyir / 'dug 'dod na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste /
analyzed: ba'i phyir / 'dug 'dod na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bkang ste /
translated: he sits on a Dharma seat that fills the entire billion-world-galactic universe,

original: chos kyi stan la 'dug cing bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par phye ste sems can rnams la chos ston to //
analyzed: chos kyi stan la 'dug cing bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par phye ste sems can rnams la chos ston to //
translated: and teaches the Dharma to beings, analyzing the topics in accordance with their thoughts.

original: de'i chos kyi stan ni de bzhin gshegs pa dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa rnams ma gtogs par thams cad las 'phags pa snang ba tshad med pa dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i chos kyi stan ni de bzhin gshegs pa dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa rnams ma gtogs par thams cad las 'phags pa snang ba tshad med pa dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: And that Dharma seat of his is superior to all others, except for those of the Tathagatas and the Bodhisattvas who have attained the stages, and it is endowed with immeasurable radiance.

original: de chos kyi stan la 'dug nas /
analyzed: de chos kyi stan la 'dug nas /
translated: Having sat down on the Dharma seat,

original: 'dod na sgra skad gcig gis 'khor thams cad go bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dod na sgra skad gcig gis 'khor thams cad go bar byed do //
translated: if he wishes, he can make the whole retinue understand with a single sound.

original: 'dod na sga tha dad pa dang / sgra skad kyi yan lag tha dad pa rnam par phye ba rnams kyis go bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dod na sga tha dad pa dang / sgra skad kyi yan lag tha dad pa rnam par phye ba rnams kyis go bar byed do //
translated: If he wishes, he can make them understand with different sounds and different aspects of sound.

original: 'dod na 'od zer gyi sgo nye bar sgrub pa las chos kyi sgo rnams 'byung bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dod na 'od zer gyi sgo nye bar sgrub pa las chos kyi sgo rnams 'byung bar byed do //
translated: If he wishes, he can make the Dharma doors arise from the attainment of the doors of light rays.

original: 'dod na spu'i khung bu rnam par dbye ba thams cad nas sgra skad thams cad 'byung bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dod na spu'i khung bu rnam par dbye ba thams cad nas sgra skad thams cad 'byung bar byed do //
translated: If he wishes, he can make all sounds arise from all the divisions of the pores.

original: 'dod na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs su snang ba ji snyed yod pa'i gzugs su snang ba de dag thams cad las chos kyi sgra 'byung bar byed do //🔽'dod na sgra skad gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad go bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dod na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs su snang ba ji snyed yod pa'i gzugs su snang ba de dag thams cad las chos kyi sgra 'byung bar byed do // 'dod na sgra skad gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad go bar byed do //
translated: If he wishes, he can make the sound of Dharma arise from all the appearances of forms that exist in the great trichiliocosm.🔽If he wishes, he can make the whole realm of phenomena understand with a single sound.

original: 'dod na sgra skad thams cad kyi sgrar byin gyis brlab po //
analyzed: 'dod na sgra skad thams cad kyi sgrar byin gyis brlab po //
translated: If he wishes, he can bless all sounds as the sound of Dharma.

original: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan gyi sgra thams cad las chos kyi sgra 'byung bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan gyi sgra thams cad las chos kyi sgra 'byung bar byed do //
translated: If he wishes, he causes the sound of Dharma to come forth from all the songs, musical sounds, and sounds of cymbals that exist in all the world systems.

original: 'dod na yi ge gcig gi sgra las tshig thams cad rab tu phye ba'i sgra 'byung bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dod na yi ge gcig gi sgra las tshig thams cad rab tu phye ba'i sgra 'byung bar byed do //
translated: If he wishes, he causes the sound of all the words to come forth from the sound of one letter.

original: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung gi phung po tshad med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul phra rab tu phye ba'i rdul re re las chos kyi sgo brjod du med pa 'byung bar byed do zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod na 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung gi phung po tshad med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul phra rab tu phye ba'i rdul re re las chos kyi sgo brjod du med pa 'byung bar byed do zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: If he wishes, he causes the sound of the Dharma to come forth from each atom of the immeasurable heaps of earth, water, fire, and wind atoms in the inexpressibly numerous world systems.

original: dris pa'i lan 'debs pa phun sum tshogs pa ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: dris pa'i lan 'debs pa phun sum tshogs pa ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The perfection of answering questions is as follows.

original: gal te stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams lhags te /
analyzed: gal te stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams lhags te /
translated: If all the sentient beings included in the thousandfold world systems were to come to him

original: de la skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la dri ba yongs su 'dri zhing /
analyzed: de la skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la dri ba yongs su 'dri zhing /
translated: and ask him questions in an instant, in a moment, in a second,

original: de dag re res kyang sgra rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pas yongs su dris la /
analyzed: de dag re res kyang sgra rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pas yongs su dris la /
translated: Each of them asks with an immeasurable number of different sounds.

original: gcig gis gang dris pa de gnyis pas ma yin na 'ang /
analyzed: gcig gis gang dris pa de gnyis pas ma yin na 'ang /
translated: What one asks, the other does not.

original: byang chub sems dpa' des skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig nyid la thams cad bzung ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' des skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig nyid la thams cad bzung ste /
translated: But that bodhisattva in one instant, in one moment, in one second, comprehends all of it.

original: tshig @244b gcig brjod pas thams cad go bar byed do //
analyzed: tshig @244b gcig brjod pas thams cad go bar byed do //
translated: With a single utterance, he makes them all understand.

original: gal te stong gnyis su gtogs pa dang / stong gsum du gtogs pa nas /
analyzed: gal te stong gnyis su gtogs pa dang / stong gsum du gtogs pa nas /
translated: If the beings of the two-thousand-fold world system, the three-thousand-fold world system,

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par gtogs pa'i sems can rnams lhags te skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la dri ba yongs su 'dri zhing /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par gtogs pa'i sems can rnams lhags te skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la dri ba yongs su 'dri zhing /
translated: up to the beings of the ineffable quintillion world systems were to come and in one instant, in one moment, in one second, ask him questions,

original: de dag re res kyang sgra rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pas yongs su dris la /
analyzed: de dag re res kyang sgra rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pas yongs su dris la /
translated: each asking with an immeasurable number of different sounds,

original: gcig gis gang dris pa de gnyis pas ma yin na'ang /
analyzed: gcig gis gang dris pa de gnyis pas ma yin na'ang /
translated: what one asks, the other does not.

original: byang chub sems dpa' des skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig nyid la thams cad bzung ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' des skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig nyid la thams cad bzung ste /
translated: In an instant, a short moment, a small fraction of time, that bodhisattva can take all of that in.

original: tshig gcig brjod pas thams cad go bar byed do //
analyzed: tshig gcig brjod pas thams cad go bar byed do //
translated: And by uttering a single word, he can make everyone understand.

original: chos kyi gtam gyi phyir 'dug nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs len cing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag gis sems can thams cad la nye bar gnas pa yin no zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi gtam gyi phyir 'dug nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs len cing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag gis sems can thams cad la nye bar gnas pa yin no zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: And when he sits down to give a Dharma talk, he can take on the blessing of the Tathagata and remain in the presence of all sentient beings with all the activities of a Buddha.

original: 'dzin pa phun sum tshogs pa ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: 'dzin pa phun sum tshogs pa ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The perfection of retention is explained in the following passage:

original: de de bas kyang shes cher ye shes kyi snang ba 'di lta bu rab tu 'dzin par rtsom ste /
analyzed: de de bas kyang shes cher ye shes kyi snang ba 'di lta bu rab tu 'dzin par rtsom ste /
translated: For that reason, he begins to take in an even greater light of wisdom.

original: gal te skra'i rtse mo'i go gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs la /
analyzed: gal te skra'i rtse mo'i go gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs la /
translated: If there were as many Tathagatas as there are atoms in inexpressibly many world systems on a single hairtip,

original: de snyed du tshad med pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na chos ston cing /
analyzed: de snyed du tshad med pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na chos ston cing /
translated: and they were teaching the Dharma in circles of retinues as limitless as that,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re res kyang de snyed du tshad med pa'i sems can rnams la chos tha dad pa ston la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re res kyang de snyed du tshad med pa'i sems can rnams la chos tha dad pa ston la /
translated: Each of those tathagatas teaches the Dharma to immeasurable sentient beings in that way.

original: sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyu re re la yang de snyed du tshad med pa'i chos nye bar sgrub pa nye bar sgrub ste /
analyzed: sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyu re re la yang de snyed du tshad med pa'i chos nye bar sgrub pa nye bar sgrub ste /
translated: For each cause of the aspiration of sentient beings, they establish immeasurable Dharma.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang de bzhin la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang de bzhin la /
translated: Just as it is for one tathagata, it is the same for all tathagatas.

original: skra'i rtse mo'i go gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings thams cad na yang de bzhin la /
analyzed: skra'i rtse mo'i go gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings thams cad na yang de bzhin la /
translated: Just as it is for one hair tip, it is the same for the entire dharmadhatu.

original: der bdag gis ci nas kyang skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thad nas skad cig las tha mi dad pa'i chos kyi snang ba nod pa de lta bu'i dran pa rgya chen po bsgrub par bya zhing ;
analyzed: der bdag gis ci nas kyang skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thad nas skad cig las tha mi dad pa'i chos kyi snang ba nod pa de lta bu'i dran pa rgya chen po bsgrub par bya zhing ;
translated: In that way, I will accomplish vast mindfulness so that in a single instant, I will receive the light of Dharma from all tathagatas without being separate from an instant.

original: ji skad brjod pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chos nyan pa ris tha dad pa rnams kyis yongs su gang ba /
analyzed: ji skad brjod pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chos nyan pa ris tha dad pa rnams kyis yongs su gang ba /
translated: and the circle of retinue as described, filled with different kinds of Dharma listeners.

original: ji snyed pa de dag tu yang skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la /
analyzed: ji snyed pa de dag tu yang skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la /
translated: In all of those, in a single moment, a single instant, a single second,

original: sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed na /
analyzed: sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed na /
translated: I will satisfy all sentient beings.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams de tsam dag gi sems can rnams lta smos @245a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams de tsam dag gi sems can rnams lta smos @245a * //
translated: What need is there to mention the sentient beings of just that many world systems?

original: kyang ci dgos pa de lta bu'i shes rab kyi snang ba rnam par nges pa'i spobs pa bdag gis yongs su sbyang bar bya'o snyam mo zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: kyang ci dgos pa de lta bu'i shes rab kyi snang ba rnam par nges pa'i spobs pa bdag gis yongs su sbyang bar bya'o snyam mo zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: I will purify that kind of wisdom illumination, the eloquence of ascertainment.”

original: 'di rnams ni brda phrad par sla bas rnam par dbye ba ma byas so //
analyzed: 'di rnams ni brda phrad par sla bas rnam par dbye ba ma byas so //
translated: These are easy to understand, so I will not analyze them.

original: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: 'phags pa sa bcu pa las sa dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'phags pa sa bcu pa las sa dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: This completes the explanation of the ninth ground of the noble ones.

original: // / sa dgu pa la zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba nas /
analyzed: // / sa dgu pa la zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba nas /
translated: On the ninth ground, there is the purification of the realm and the bringing of sentient beings to full maturity,

original: sa bcu pa la shes bya mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
analyzed: sa bcu pa la shes bya mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
translated: On the tenth level, the bodhisattva perfects the meditation that is to be fully enlightened with regard to the knowable.

original: 'di ni khyad par ro //🔽de yang yongs su sbyang ba bya ba'i sa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa thob pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa dang / che ba nyid mthar phyin par song ba dang / sa'i nges pa'i tshig dang /
analyzed: 'di ni khyad par ro // de yang yongs su sbyang ba bya ba'i sa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa thob pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa dang / che ba nyid mthar phyin par song ba dang / sa'i nges pa'i tshig dang /
translated: This is the difference.🔽Moreover, it should be understood that the ten levels are presented in terms of eight topics: the complete accomplishment of the level of complete training, the attainment of the complete accomplishment of meditative absorption, the attainment of consecration, the consummation of greatness, the etymology of the levels,

original: mthu bla na med pa dang / bla na yod pa dang / sa'i dpe dang / sa'i phan yon dang / rnam pa brgyad kyis rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mthu bla na med pa dang / bla na yod pa dang / sa'i dpe dang / sa'i phan yon dang / rnam pa brgyad kyis rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o //
translated: the unsurpassable power, the surpassable power, the analogies for the levels and the benefits of the levels.

original: de la yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sa yongs su rdzogs pa ni shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa nyid kyis sa dgu po rnams yongs su rdzogs par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de la yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i sa yongs su rdzogs pa ni shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa nyid kyis sa dgu po rnams yongs su rdzogs par rig par bya ste /
translated: The complete accomplishment of the level of complete training should be understood as the complete accomplishment of the nine levels through the thorough analysis of the extremely well differentiated.

original: gang gi phyir kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' de /
analyzed: gang gi phyir kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' de /
translated: O son of the victors, the bodhisattva

original: de ltar sa dgu pa'i bar du shes bya tshad med pa la rnam par brtags pa'i blos zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar sa dgu pa'i bar du shes bya tshad med pa la rnam par brtags pa'i blos zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: Thus, up to the ninth stage, the wisdom that investigates immeasurable objects of knowledge.

original: shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba la shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa nyid de yang rnam pa bdun gyis rab tu phye ba ste /
analyzed: shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba la shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa nyid de yang rnam pa bdun gyis rab tu phye ba ste /
translated: The discernment of what is extremely well analyzed is also distinguished by seven aspects.

original: shin tu bsgoms pa ni tshig gsum gyis rab tu phye ba ste /
analyzed: shin tu bsgoms pa ni tshig gsum gyis rab tu phye ba ste /
translated: The discernment of what is extremely well cultivated is distinguished by three phrases.

original: gang gi phyir chos dkar po shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa /
analyzed: gang gi phyir chos dkar po shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa /
translated: Because the completely pure virtuous qualities are extremely well completed,

original: tshogs bsags par bya ba mtha' yas pa shin tu bsags pa /
analyzed: tshogs bsags par bya ba mtha' yas pa shin tu bsags pa /
translated: the infinite accumulations of merit are extremely well gathered,

original: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po shin tu yongs su bzung ba zhes gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po shin tu yongs su bzung ba zhes gsungs pa ste /
translated: and the great accumulations of merit and wisdom are extremely well grasped.

original: tshig 'di dag ni bshad pa'i mtshams sbyar ba yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: tshig 'di dag ni bshad pa'i mtshams sbyar ba yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: These phrases should be understood as connecting with the explanation.

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi don la zhugs pa'i phyir khyab pas rab tu phye ba ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi don la zhugs pa'i phyir khyab pas rab tu phye ba ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The discernment of pervasion is distinguished by the fact that it engages for the benefit of self and others.

original: snying rje chen pos shin tu rgyas pa thob pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen pos shin tu rgyas pa thob pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: and by great compassion, he attains the extensive.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pas rab tu phye ba ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pas rab tu phye ba ni gang gi phyir /
translated: It is distinguished by the purification of the Buddha-field, because

original: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba rnam pa tha dad pa la mkhas pa zhes @245b gsungs pa'o //🔽sems can yongs su smin par byed pas rab tu phye ba ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba rnam pa tha dad pa la mkhas pa zhes @245b gsungs pa'o // sems can yongs su smin par byed pas rab tu phye ba ni gang gi phyir /
translated: he is skilled in the various divisions of the world-realms.🔽It is distinguished by the development of living beings, because

analyzed: sems can gyi khams kyi rgyu ba thibs po la zhugs pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: he penetrates the thickets of the world of living beings.

analyzed: shin tu rig pa ni gang gi phyir /
translated: It is distinguished by the knowledge of the good and bad spiritual faculties of living beings, because🔽he penetrates the various inclinations of living beings.🔽It is distinguished by the knowledge of the various forms of the thoughts of living beings, because🔽he penetrates the various activities of living beings.🔽It is distinguished by the knowledge of the various degrees of the spiritual faculties of living beings, because🔽he penetrates the various degrees of the spiritual faculties of living beings.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la 'jug pas mthun par gyur ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pa zhes gsungs te /
