original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ni de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ni de bzhin nyid do //
translated: he penetrates the various degrees of the spiritual faculties of living beings.

original: chog par mi 'dzin pas rab tu phye ba ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: chog par mi 'dzin pas rab tu phye ba ni gang gi phyir /
translated: It is distinguished by the knowledge of the various degrees of the spiritual faculties of living beings, because🔽he penetrates the various degrees of the spiritual faculties of living beings.🔽It is distinguished by the knowledge of the various degrees of the spiritual faculties of

original: stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la lhag par dmigs pa dang ldan pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la lhag par dmigs pa dang ldan pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: and the powers, fearlessnesses, and unshared qualities of a buddha.

original: sa'i mthar thug par song bas rab tu phye ba ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: sa'i mthar thug par song bas rab tu phye ba ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The bodhisattva who has reached the end of the stages is distinguished by the fact that

original: rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sa la dbang bskur ba thob pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sa la dbang bskur ba thob pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: he has attained the consecration of the stage of the knowledge of all the aspects of the knowable.

original: de ltar yongs su sbyang ba bya ba'i sa yongs su rdzogs pas sa bcu pa rnam par gzhag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar yongs su sbyang ba bya ba'i sa yongs su rdzogs pas sa bcu pa rnam par gzhag pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the ten stages by way of the completion of the stages of purification,

original: ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa thob pas ston to //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa thob pas ston to //
translated: he teaches the completion of the perfections by way of the completion of the concentrations.

original: de la ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa thob pa ni ting nge 'dzin dri ma med pa 'khor dang bcas pa mngon du gyur ba yin par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de la ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa thob pa ni ting nge 'dzin dri ma med pa 'khor dang bcas pa mngon du gyur ba yin par rig par bya ste /
translated: The completion of the concentrations should be understood as the actualization of the stainless concentrations together with their retinue.

original: gang gi phyir kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes de lta bu dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: gang gi phyir kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes de lta bu dang ldan zhing /
translated: For, O son of the victors, the bodhisattva who is endowed with such knowledge

original: dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa de la ;
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa de la ;
translated: The stage of consecration is attained by that bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba mngon du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba mngon du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ste /
translated: The bodhisattva’s meditative stabilization called Stainless is manifested.

original: nyon mongs pa rgyang sring bar byed pa'i don gyi dri ma med pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rgyang sring bar byed pa'i don gyi dri ma med pa'o //
translated: It is stainless in the sense of removing the afflictions far away.

original: bsgrib mi dgos par mngon du gyur pas mngon du 'gyur ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bsgrib mi dgos par mngon du gyur pas mngon du 'gyur ba zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called manifested because it is manifested without the need for obscuration.

original: de yang ting nge 'dzin rnam pa dgus dri ma med pa nyid rnam pa brgyad du rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de yang ting nge 'dzin rnam pa dgus dri ma med pa nyid rnam pa brgyad du rig par bya ste /
translated: Moreover, stainlessness should be understood as eightfold by means of nine kinds of meditative stabilizations.

original: ldem po ngag la 'jug pa dri ma med pa nyid ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: ldem po ngag la 'jug pa dri ma med pa nyid ni gang gi phyir /
translated: Stainlessness in engaging the indirect intention is that by which

original: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dbye ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dbye ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: it is said, “It is called the meditative stabilization that engages the differentiation of the realm of phenomena.”

original: nye ba dri ma med pa nyid ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: nye ba dri ma med pa nyid ni gang gi phyir /
translated: Stainlessness in proximity is that by which

original: byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gyi tshogs can zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gyi tshogs can zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: it is said, “It is called the meditative stabilization that is the collection of ornaments of the essence of enlightenment.”

original: 'od zer rab tu gtong ba dri ma med pa nyid ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: 'od zer rab tu gtong ba dri ma med pa nyid ni gang gi phyir /
translated: Stainlessness in emitting light rays is that by which🔽it is said, “It is called the meditative stabilization that emits light rays.”

original: 'od zer rnam pa thams cad kyi me tog ces bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'od zer rnam pa thams cad kyi me tog ces bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: The light is called “the flower of all forms.”

original: gzung med pa nyid ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gzung med pa nyid ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The absence of grasping is taught by the line

original: rgya mtsho'i snying po lta bu can zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i snying po lta bu can zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: “it is like the essence of the ocean.”

original: mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dri ma med pa ni gang gi phyir /🔽rgya @246a * //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dri ma med pa ni gang gi phyir / rgya @246a * //
translated: The stainless accomplishment of the superknowledges is taught by the line

original: mtsho lta bur 'byor ba zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: mtsho lta bur 'byor ba zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: “it is like the ocean, a source of wealth.”

original: zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dri ma med pa nyid ni mtha' yas pa dang / de kho na la dmigs pa'i tshig gnyis kyis ston te /
analyzed: zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dri ma med pa nyid ni mtha' yas pa dang / de kho na la dmigs pa'i tshig gnyis kyis ston te /
translated: The stainlessness of the purification of the realm is taught by the two lines that refer to infinity and reality,

original: gang gi phyir na ma mkha'i khams ltar rgyas pa zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir na ma mkha'i khams ltar rgyas pa zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: “it is like the element of space, vast,” and “it is the discernment of the nature of all phenomena.”

original: sems can yongs su smin par byed pas dri ma med pa nyid ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par byed pas dri ma med pa nyid ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The stainlessness of the ripening of sentient beings is taught by the line🔽“it is the source of the jewels of the buddhas.”

original: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rjes su rtogs pa zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rjes su rtogs pa zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: It is called “the realization of the mental activity of all sentient beings.”

original: da ltar gyi sangs rgyas thams cad gzhan dang / gzhan mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa mngon du gyur pa shes pas mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa dri ma med pa ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: da ltar gyi sangs rgyas thams cad gzhan dang / gzhan mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa mngon du gyur pa shes pas mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa dri ma med pa ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The stainless realization of the present is the realization of the present manifestation of the complete enlightenment of all other buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du bzhugs pa mngon du 'gyur te zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du bzhugs pa mngon du 'gyur te zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: It is said, “The bodhisattva samādhi called the Manifestation of the Presence of All Buddhas manifests.”

original: de dag la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu de la mngon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu de la mngon du 'gyur ro //
translated: These and so forth, ten hundred thousand countless samādhis manifest to him.

original: de ting nge 'dzin de dag thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ngo //
analyzed: de ting nge 'dzin de dag thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ngo //
translated: He enters into and arises from all those samādhis.

original: ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa dang ldan pa yang yin te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa dang ldan pa yang yin te /
translated: He is skilled in samādhi.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi bya ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang nyams su myong ngo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi bya ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang nyams su myong ngo //
translated: He experiences all the activities of samādhi.

original: de la ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu ni snyed pa'i tha ma la byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang khyad par dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba mngon du 'gyur te zhes bya ba thams cad
analyzed: de la ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu ni snyed pa'i tha ma la byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang khyad par dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba mngon du 'gyur te zhes bya ba thams cad
translated: Ten hundred thousand countless concentrations are the end of the approximation, at which time the bodhisattva concentration called endowed with the gnosis of omniscience and the special empowerment manifests.

original: mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang khyad par med par dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang mnyam pa nyid du dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa ste /🔽ting nge 'dzin gyi bya ba ji snyed pa nyams su myong bas ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par ston to //
analyzed: mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang khyad par med par dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang mnyam pa nyid du dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa ste / ting nge 'dzin gyi bya ba ji snyed pa nyams su myong bas ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par ston to //
translated: Endowed with the special empowerment that is not different from the gnosis of omniscience is endowed with the empowerment that is equal to the gnosis of omniscience.🔽This teaches that the concentration is perfected through the experience of all the activities of concentration.

original: de ltar ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa thob pas sa rnam par gzhag pa bstan nas dbang bskur ba thob pas ston to //
analyzed: de ltar ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa thob pas sa rnam par gzhag pa bstan nas dbang bskur ba thob pas ston to //
translated: Having taught the presentation of the levels through the attainment of the perfected concentration, he teaches the attainment of the empowerment.

original: de la dbang bskur ba thob pa ni stan gang dang / lus kyi tshad ni ji tsam pa dang / 'khor gang dang / mtshan ma gang byung bar gyur ba dang / gang gis ji ltar dbang bskur ba de ston par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de la dbang bskur ba thob pa ni stan gang dang / lus kyi tshad ni ji tsam pa dang / 'khor gang dang / mtshan ma gang byung bar gyur ba dang / gang gis ji ltar dbang bskur ba de ston par rig par bya'o //
translated: The consecration should be understood as the place, the size of the body, the retinue, the signs that appear, and by whom and how the consecration is performed.

original: de la stan gyi mtshan nyid ni rnam pa bcu ste /
analyzed: de la stan gyi mtshan nyid ni rnam pa bcu ste /
translated: The place has ten characteristics.

original: tshad kyi mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: tshad kyi mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The size is indicated by the statement,

original: de mngon du gyur ma thag tu @246b stong gsum 'bum phrag bcu'i gtos dang mnyam pa'i zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de mngon du gyur ma thag tu @246b stong gsum 'bum phrag bcu'i gtos dang mnyam pa'i zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: “Immediately upon its appearance, a lotus arises the size of ten billion trichiliocosms.”

original: mchog gi rang bzhin gyi bdag po dang 'brel ba'i mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: mchog gi rang bzhin gyi bdag po dang 'brel ba'i mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The characteristic of the supreme nature connected with the lord is indicated by the statement,

original: rin po che chen po'i rgyal po'i padma 'byung bar 'gyur te zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rin po che chen po'i rgyal po'i padma 'byung bar 'gyur te zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: “A lotus arises made of the king of great jewels.”

original: mchog gi rang bzhin gyi khyad par gyi mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: mchog gi rang bzhin gyi khyad par gyi mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The characteristic of the supreme nature’s distinction is indicated by the statement,

original: rin po che'i rnam pa thams cad kyis spras pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i rnam pa thams cad kyis spras pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: “It is adorned with all kinds of jewels.”

original: sa'i mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: sa'i mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The characteristic of the stage is that it is said:

original: 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: “it is completely beyond all worldly objects.”

original: rgyu'i mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: rgyu'i mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The characteristic of the cause is that it is said:

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: “it arises from supramundane roots of virtue.”

original: grub pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The characteristic of accomplishment is that it is said:

original: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi spyod yul du yongs su grub pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi spyod yul du yongs su grub pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: “it is accomplished as the domain of the nature of illusion.”

original: don dam pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: don dam pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The characteristic of the ultimate is that it is said:

original: chos kyi dbyings la shin tu gnas par snang ba zhes gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la shin tu gnas par snang ba zhes gsungs pa ste /
translated: “it appears as the perfect abode of the dharmadhātu.”

original: shin tu gnas pa ni legs par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: shin tu gnas pa ni legs par gnas pa'o //
translated: The perfect abode is the excellent abode.

original: lha'i dri bsung las yang dag par 'das pas yon tan gyi mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: lha'i dri bsung las yang dag par 'das pas yon tan gyi mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The characteristic of the qualities is that it is said:

original: lha'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: lha'i yul las yang dag par 'das pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: “it is completely beyond the fragrance of the gods.”

original: chu ba dang snying po la sogs pa rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: chu ba dang snying po la sogs pa rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The characteristic of the nature is that it is said:🔽“it is completely beyond the objects of the gods.”

original: nor bu rin po che bee d'urya chen po'i chu ba can /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che bee d'urya chen po'i chu ba can /
translated: Its stem is made of the great precious gem beryl.

original: tsandan gyi rgyal po mtshungs pa med pa'i snying po can /
analyzed: tsandan gyi rgyal po mtshungs pa med pa'i snying po can /
translated: Its heart is made of the king of sandalwood, which is incomparable.

original: rdo rje'i snying po chen po'i ze ba can /
analyzed: rdo rje'i snying po chen po'i ze ba can /
translated: Its pistil is made of the great vajra.

original: 'dzam bu'i chu'i gser ltar snang ba'i lo ma can /
analyzed: 'dzam bu'i chu'i gser ltar snang ba'i lo ma can /
translated: Its leaves shine like the gold of the Jambu River.

original: 'od zer dpag tu med pas rgyas pa'i lus can zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'od zer dpag tu med pas rgyas pa'i lus can zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: Its body is filled with immeasurable light rays.

original: rgyan gyi mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: rgyan gyi mtshan nyid ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The characteristics of the ornaments are as follows.

original: rin po che thams cad kyis nang rab tu spras pa /
analyzed: rin po che thams cad kyis nang rab tu spras pa /
translated: It is completely adorned inside with all precious substances.

original: rin po che'i dra ba mu med pas kun nas yog pa /
analyzed: rin po che'i dra ba mu med pas kun nas yog pa /
translated: It is covered with a limitless net of jewels.

original: stong gsum 'bum phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyad kyi padma'i 'khor dang ldan pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: stong gsum 'bum phrag bcu tshang ba'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyad kyi padma'i 'khor dang ldan pa zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: It has a retinue of lotuses equal in number to the atoms in a million billionfold worlds.

original: lus kyi tshad ci tsam la zhe na /
analyzed: lus kyi tshad ci tsam la zhe na /
translated: What is the size of the body?

original: sten gyi rkyen du bab pa'i lus kyi dbyibs la ste /
analyzed: sten gyi rkyen du bab pa'i lus kyi dbyibs la ste /
translated: It is the size of the body that is suitable for the environment.

original: gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyang de dang 'tsham zhing /
analyzed: gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyang de dang 'tsham zhing /
translated: Because the body of that bodhisattva is also suitable for that.

original: de'i rkyen du bab par gnas so //
analyzed: de'i rkyen du bab par gnas so //
translated: and the conditions for that are present.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang khyad par med par dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag du rin po che chen po'i rgyal po'i padma'i stan de la 'dug par kun du snang ngo zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang khyad par med par dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag du rin po che chen po'i rgyal po'i padma'i stan de la 'dug par kun du snang ngo zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: Immediately upon attaining that samādhi, which is inseparable from the wisdom of omniscience and is endowed with empowerment, he is seen sitting on that lion throne of great precious jewels.

original: 'khor gang gi nang du zhen /🔽rin po che chen @247a * //🔽po'i rgyal po'i padma'i stan de'i 'khor gyi padma la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi nang du ste /
analyzed: 'khor gang gi nang du zhen / rin po che chen @247a * // po'i rgyal po'i padma'i stan de'i 'khor gyi padma la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi nang du ste /
translated: In what retinue?🔽In the retinue of bodhisattvas sitting on lotuses of the great precious jewel lion throne.

original: gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' de rin po che chen po'i rgyal po'i padma de la 'dug ma thag tu de nas rin po che chen po'i rgyal po'i padma'i 'khor rin po che chen po'i padma ji snyed byung ba de snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' dag
analyzed: gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' de rin po che chen po'i rgyal po'i padma de la 'dug ma thag tu de nas rin po che chen po'i rgyal po'i padma'i 'khor rin po che chen po'i padma ji snyed byung ba de snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' dag
translated: Because as soon as that bodhisattva sits on that great precious jewel lotus, then as many bodhisattvas as there are great precious jewel lotuses in the retinue of that great precious jewel lotus

original: gis byang chub sems dpa' de bskor nas rin po che chen po'i padma de dag kyang phan 'dogs pa'i las can padma de dag la 'khod par snang ste /
analyzed: gis byang chub sems dpa' de bskor nas rin po che chen po'i padma de dag kyang phan 'dogs pa'i las can padma de dag la 'khod par snang ste /
translated: The bodhisattvas surround him, and those great precious lotuses appear to be engaged in the act of benefiting, since they are situated on those lotuses.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de nyid la lta zhing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de nyid la lta zhing /
translated: They appear to be looking at just that bodhisattva.

original: de dag re re yang ting nge 'dzin 'bum phrag bcu bcu la snyoms par 'jug go zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de dag re re yang ting nge 'dzin 'bum phrag bcu bcu la snyoms par 'jug go zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: And each of them enters into ten hundred thousand samādhis.

original: mtshan ma gang byung bar gyur na zhes bya ba ni 'od zer byung ba ste /
analyzed: mtshan ma gang byung bar gyur na zhes bya ba ni 'od zer byung ba ste /
translated: When what sign appears? The appearance of light rays.

original: de dag kyang phan 'dogs pa'i las can dang / sbron pa'i las can dang / 'gugs pa'i las can te /
analyzed: de dag kyang phan 'dogs pa'i las can dang / sbron pa'i las can dang / 'gugs pa'i las can te /
translated: And those have the function of benefiting, the function of announcing, and the function of summoning.

original: las gsum dang ldan par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: las gsum dang ldan par rig par bya ste /
translated: They should be known to have three functions.

original: gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because as soon as that bodhisattva and those bodhisattvas enter into meditative equipoise, all world systems without exception shake.

original: ngan song thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ngan song thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: All lower realms are interrupted.

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad snang bas rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thams cad snang bas rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: It will illuminate the entire realm of phenomena.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: It will purify all world systems.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du ming gi sgra grag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du ming gi sgra grag par 'gyur ro //
translated: The sound of its name will be heard in all buddhafields.

original: spyod pa mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'du bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyod pa mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'du bar 'gyur ro //
translated: All bodhisattvas who are in accord with its conduct will gather there.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lha dang / mi'i rol mo glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan gyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi lha dang / mi'i rol mo glu dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan gyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The sounds of music, song, and cymbals of the gods and humans of all world systems will arise.

original: sems can thams cad la bde ba skye par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la bde ba skye par 'gyur ro //
translated: All beings will experience happiness.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It will perform inconceivable worship and service to all the perfect buddhas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis kyang rnam par rig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis kyang rnam par rig par 'gyur ro //
translated: It will be known in the circles of all the assemblies of the tathāgatas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de rin po che chen po'i rgyal po'i padma'i gdan de la 'dug ma thag tu rkang pa'i 'og gi mthil gnyis nas 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu 'byung ste /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de rin po che chen po'i rgyal po'i padma'i gdan de la 'dug ma thag tu rkang pa'i 'og gi mthil gnyis nas 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu 'byung ste /
translated: O son of the victors, as soon as the bodhisattva sits on that lion throne of a great precious king of lotuses, from the two soles of his feet ten hundred thousand countless light rays emerge.

original: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i sems can dmyal ba @247b chen po mnar med pa yan chad snang bar byed do //
analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i sems can dmyal ba @247b chen po mnar med pa yan chad snang bar byed do //
translated: Having emerged, they illuminate the sentient beings in the great hells of the ten directions, starting with the Ceaseless Torture Hell.

original: sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang rgyun chad par byed do //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang rgyun chad par byed do //
translated: They also put an end to all the sufferings of the sentient beings in the hells.

original: phus mo gnyis nas 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu 'byung ste /
analyzed: phus mo gnyis nas 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu 'byung ste /
translated: From his two knees ten hundred thousand countless light rays emerge.

original: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i gnas thams cad snang bar byed do //
analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'i gnas thams cad snang bar byed do //
translated: Having emerged, they illuminate all the abodes of the animal realms in the ten directions.

original: dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //
analyzed: dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //

original: lte ba khung nas 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu 'byung ste /
analyzed: lte ba khung nas 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu 'byung ste /

analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi gnas thams cad snang bar byed do //
translated: Having arisen, it illuminates all the worlds of the lords of death in the ten directions.

analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //

original: rtsib logs g-yas g-yon nas 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu 'byung ste /
analyzed: rtsib logs g-yas g-yon nas 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu 'byung ste /

original: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i mi'i gnas rnams snang bar byed do //
analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i mi'i gnas rnams snang bar byed do //
translated: Having arisen, they illuminate the human abodes in the ten directions.

original: mi'i sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //
analyzed: mi'i sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //

original: lag pa'i mthil gnyis nas 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu 'byung ste /
analyzed: lag pa'i mthil gnyis nas 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu 'byung ste /
translated: From the two palms, ten hundred thousand countless light rays emerge.

original: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i lha dang lha ma yin gyi gnas rnams snang bar byed do //
analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i lha dang lha ma yin gyi gnas rnams snang bar byed do //
translated: Having arisen, they illuminate the abodes of the gods and demigods in the ten directions.

original: lha dang lha ma yin gyi sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //
analyzed: lha dang lha ma yin gyi sdug bsngal rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do //

analyzed: phrag pa gnyis nas 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu 'byung ste ;
translated: From the two shoulders, ten hundred thousand countless light rays emerge.

original: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi gnas snang bar byed do //
analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi gnas snang bar byed do //
translated: Having arisen, it illuminates the abodes of the śrāvakas in the ten directions.

original: chos snang ba'i sgo yang nye bar sgrub po //
analyzed: chos snang ba'i sgo yang nye bar sgrub po //
translated: It also establishes the gateway to the light of the Dharma.

original: rgyab dang mgul nas 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu 'byung ste /
analyzed: rgyab dang mgul nas 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu 'byung ste /
translated: From his back and neck emerge ten hundred thousand countless light rays.

original: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i rang sangs rgyas kyi gnas rnams snang bar byed do //
analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i rang sangs rgyas kyi gnas rnams snang bar byed do //
translated: Having arisen, they illuminate the abodes of the pratyekabuddhas in the ten directions.

original: zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i tshul yang nye bar sgrub po //
analyzed: zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo'i tshul yang nye bar sgrub po //
translated: It also establishes the method of the gateway to the concentration of peace.

original: kha'i sgo nas 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu 'byung ste /
analyzed: kha'i sgo nas 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu 'byung ste /
translated: From his mouth emerge ten hundred thousand countless light rays.

original: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa yan chad sa dgu pa thob pa'i bar dag snang bar byed do //
analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa yan chad sa dgu pa thob pa'i bar dag snang bar byed do //
translated: Having arisen, they illuminate the bodhisattvas in the ten directions who have generated the initial thought of awakening up to those who have attained the ninth bhūmi.

original: shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa'i tshul yang nye bar sgrub bo //
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa'i tshul yang nye bar sgrub bo //
translated: It also establishes the method of skill in wisdom and means.

original: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu 'byung ste /
analyzed: smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu 'byung ste /
translated: From his forehead emerge ten hundred thousand countless light rays.

original: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por byas nas dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams snang bar byas te /
analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por byas nas dbang bskur ba thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams snang bar byas te /
translated: Having arisen, it darkens all the abodes of Mara in the ten directions and illuminates the Bodhisattvas who have received empowerment.

original: de dag gi lus rnams su nub par @248a * //
analyzed: de dag gi lus rnams su nub par @248a * //
translated: Then it disappears into their bodies.

original: byed do // steng gi yan lag gi dam pa mgo las stong gsum grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcur tshang ba'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed kyi 'od zer 'byung ste /
analyzed: byed do // steng gi yan lag gi dam pa mgo las stong gsum grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcur tshang ba'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed kyi 'od zer 'byung ste /
translated: From the top of their heads, the best of all their limbs, as many light rays as there are atoms in a million billion countless great triple heavens arise.

original: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar byas te /
analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar byas te /
translated: Having arisen, they illuminate all the circles of retinue of the Tathagatas in the ten directions.

original: 'jig rten la lan bcu bskor ba byas nas steng gi bar snang la 'dug ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten la lan bcu bskor ba byas nas steng gi bar snang la 'dug ste /
translated: They circle the worlds ten times and then remain in the sky above,

original: 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba 'od shin tu gsal ba zhes bya ba rab tu byed de /

translated: having formed a great circle of light rays. They perform the service of offering to the Tathagatas, called the “very bright light.”

original: mchod pa ngang rim gro bya ba de la sems dang po bskyed pa yan chad sa dgu pa thob pa'i bar dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro byas pas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro /
analyzed: mchod pa ngang rim gro bya ba de la sems dang po bskyed pa yan chad sa dgu pa thob pa'i bar dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro byas pas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro /
translated: The worship and service of the Tathagata by those who have generated the first thought of enlightenment up to the attainment of the ninth stage does not approach even a hundredth part of the worship and service of the Tathagata by those who have attained the tenth stage.

original: stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste /🔽grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas /
analyzed: stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas /
translated: It does not approach even a thousandth part, a hundred thousandth part, a ten millionth part, a billionth part, a ten billionth part, a trillionth part, a ten trillionth part, a hundred quintillionth part.

original: dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do //
analyzed: dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do //
translated: It does not approach even a count, a fraction, a comparison, an illustration, or an example.

original: 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po de las phyogs bcu nas me tog tu gdags pa dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
analyzed: 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po de las phyogs bcu nas me tog tu gdags pa dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
translated: From that great circle of light rays, in the ten directions, there are designated flowers, incense, perfume, garlands, ointments, powders, clothes, parasols, banners,

analyzed: ba dan dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / nor bu rin po cher gdags pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad pas lhag cing 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad las shin tu 'das pa /
translated: They were superior to all the banners, precious ornaments, and precious jewels in the world.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi dbang gis grub pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi dbang gis grub pa /
translated: They were formed by the power of the accumulation of roots of goodness that transcend the world.

original: yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa /
analyzed: yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa /
translated: They were endowed with all aspects of good qualities.

original: sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pas byin gyis brlabs pa /
analyzed: sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pas byin gyis brlabs pa /
translated: They were blessed by the inconceivable blessing of emanations.

original: bkod pa sna tshogs kyi nor bu rin po che chen po dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du sprin chen po'i char ltar mngon par 'bab bo //
analyzed: bkod pa sna tshogs kyi nor bu rin po che chen po dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du sprin chen po'i char ltar mngon par 'bab bo //
translated: Those great precious jewels with various arrays rained down like a great rain cloud in the retinue of the maṇḍala of each tathāgata.

original: mchod pa de dag sems can gang dag gis shes pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ni 'od zer de dag phan 'dogs pa'i las can du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: mchod pa de dag sems can gang dag gis shes pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ni 'od zer de dag phan 'dogs pa'i las can du shes par bya'o //
translated: Those sentient beings who know those offerings will all be destined for unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.🔽Those sentient beings who know those offerings will all be destined for unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

original: mchod pa de dag sems can gang dag gis shes pa de dag @248b thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de dag nges pa'i sa la nges par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha
analyzed: mchod pa de dag sems can gang dag gis shes pa de dag @248b thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de dag nges pa'i sa la nges par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha
translated: This means they will be destined for the stage of certainty.

original: tshig go // rnam grangs gzhan du na nges par 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: tshig go // rnam grangs gzhan du na nges par 'gyur ba ni /
translated: Another way of explaining this is that they will be destined for the stage of certainty.

analyzed: bya ba la bag yod par legs par sdom pa can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means they will be restrained in their actions and careful.

original: mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba de lta bu byas nas kyang 'od zer de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar byas te /
analyzed: mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba de lta bu byas nas kyang 'od zer de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad snang bar byas te /
translated: Having made such offerings and services, those light rays illuminate all the maṇḍalas of retinues of tathāgatas.

original: 'jig rten la lan bcu bskor ba byas nas /
analyzed: 'jig rten la lan bcu bskor ba byas nas /
translated: They circle the world ten times,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil rnams su nub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil rnams su nub par 'gyur te /
translated: and then disappear into the soles of the feet of those tathāgatas, arhats, and perfectly enlightened buddhas.

original: nges na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis /
analyzed: nges na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis /
translated: Then those tathāgatas and those bodhisattvas

original: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam che ge mo zhig na /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam che ge mo zhig na /
translated: know that in such and such a world system

original: byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa de lta bu dang ldan pa /
translated: a bodhisattva with such and such conduct

analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i dus la bab par thugs su chud par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ni spron pa'i las can ni //
translated: has reached the time for empowerment.”

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam mtha' yas pa dag nas der lhags nas /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam mtha' yas pa dag nas der lhags nas /
translated: O son of the victors, the bodhisattvas on the ninth ground, countless in number, come to this place from infinite world systems.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de la kun nas bskor te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de la kun nas bskor te /
translated: O son of the victors, on the ninth bodhisattva ground, Immovable, the bodhisattva is surrounded by countless, innumerable bodhisattvas from infinite world systems who have arrived there.

original: mchod pa chen po byas nas byang chub sems dpa' de nyid lta zhing /
analyzed: mchod pa chen po byas nas byang chub sems dpa' de nyid lta zhing /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'bum phrag bcu la snyoms par 'jug go //
translated: The bodhisattva enters ten hundred thousand samādhis.

original: byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa rnams kyi dpal be'u dang / rdo rje dang bkra shis las bdud kyi dgra las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer chen po cig 'od zer gyi 'khor grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu bcu 'byung ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa rnams kyi dpal be'u dang / rdo rje dang bkra shis las bdud kyi dgra las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer chen po cig 'od zer gyi 'khor grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu bcu 'byung ste /
translated: From the glorious knot, vajra, and auspiciousness of the bodhisattvas who have attained the ground of consecration, a great light ray called Victorious over the Enemy of Demons arises, with a retinue of countless ten-hundred thousand light rays.

original: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu snang bar byas nas cho 'phrul mu med pa yang dag par bstan to /
analyzed: byung nas kyang phyogs bcu snang bar byas nas cho 'phrul mu med pa yang dag par bstan to /
translated: Having arisen, it illuminates the ten directions and displays limitless miracles.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de'i dpal be'u dang / rdo rje dang bkra shis la nub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de'i dpal be'u dang / rdo rje dang bkra shis la nub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The glory, the vajra, and the auspiciousness of that bodhisattva will wane.

original: 'od zer de dag der nub ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de'i stobs dang / mthu yang 'bum gyur pas kyang lhag par mngon par 'phel bar snang ngo zhes gsungs pa ni 'gugs pa'i las can te /

translated: Immediately after those light rays disappear there, the power and might of that bodhisattva will appear to increase a hundred thousand times more.

original: de lta bu ni mtshan ma gang byung nas dbang bskur ba'o /
analyzed: de lta bu ni mtshan ma gang byung nas dbang bskur ba'o /
translated: This is the activity of summoning.

original: // / dpal be'u dang / rdo rje dang bkra shis zhes bya ba'i mtshan ni @249a * //
analyzed: // / dpal be'u dang / rdo rje dang bkra shis zhes bya ba'i mtshan ni @249a * //

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying ga na yod par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying ga na yod par rig par bya'o //
translated: should be known as existing in the hearts of bodhisattvas.

original: gang gis dbang bskur zhe na /🔽byang chub sems dpa' de dang phan tshun ye shes mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par yongs su 'dzin par /
analyzed: gang gis dbang bskur zhe na / byang chub sems dpa' de dang phan tshun ye shes mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par yongs su 'dzin par /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer gyis dbang bskur te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer gyis dbang bskur te /
translated: By the light rays of the tathāgatas, who empower them in the mutual perfect possession of the sameness of wisdom.

original: gang gi phyir kye rgyal ba'i sras de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mdzod spu dag nas /
analyzed: gang gi phyir kye rgyal ba'i sras de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mdzod spu dag nas /
translated: O children of the Victorious Ones, from the ūrṇā hair between the eyebrows of those thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor gyi 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu bcu 'byung ste /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor gyi 'od zer grangs med pa 'bum phrag bcu bcu 'byung ste /
translated: a ray of light called “omniscience endowed with super-knowledge” emerges, accompanied by countless hundreds of thousands of light rays.

original: de dag gis phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par snang bar byas nas /
analyzed: de dag gis phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par snang bar byas nas /
translated: They illuminate all the worlds in the ten directions without exception.

original: 'jig rten la lan bcu bskor ba byas te /
analyzed: 'jig rten la lan bcu bskor ba byas te /
translated: They circle the worlds ten times,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po rnams bstan /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po rnams bstan /
translated: displaying the great emanations of the thus-gone ones.

original: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po bskul /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po bskul /
translated: They inspire many quintillions of bodhisattvas,

original: sangs rgyas zhing rab 'byam thams cad rnam pa drug tu bskyod de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhing rab 'byam thams cad rnam pa drug tu bskyod de /
translated: shaking all the infinite buddha realms in six ways.

original: ngan song thams cad 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'gro bar skye ba rab tu zhi bar byas /
analyzed: ngan song thams cad 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'gro bar skye ba rab tu zhi bar byas /
translated: They pacify all the deaths and rebirths in the lower realms.

original: bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por byas /
analyzed: bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por byas /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gdan kun du bstan nas /
