analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i mthu rab tu bstan te / 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyi sa klas pa /
translated: It revealed the power of the array of the retinue of all the buddhas.🔽It illuminated all the world systems that pervade the realm of phenomena,

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad snang bar byas nas phyir log ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad snang bar byas nas phyir log ste /
translated: the extent of space, and then returned.

original: byang sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi steng nas bskor ba byas nas bkod pa chen po bstan te /🔽'od zer de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de'i yan lag gi dam pa mgor nub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi steng nas bskor ba byas nas bkod pa chen po bstan te / 'od zer de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de'i yan lag gi dam pa mgor nub par 'gyur ro //
translated: It circled above the entire retinue of bodhisattvas and revealed a great array.🔽Those light rays then disappeared into the bodhisattva’s crown protrusion.

original: de'i 'khor gyi 'od zer rnams ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mgor nub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i 'khor gyi 'od zer rnams ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mgor nub par 'gyur te /
translated: The light rays of his retinue disappeared into the crowns of the bodhisattvas.

original: 'od zer de dag gis phog ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sngon ma thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu thob bo //
analyzed: 'od zer de dag gis phog ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sngon ma thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu thob bo //
translated: As soon as they are touched by this light, these Bodhisattvas obtain ten thousand concentrations that they have not obtained before.

original: 'od zer de dag kyang dus gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' de'i yan lag gi mgo la 'bab bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'od zer de dag kyang dus gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' de'i yan lag gi mgo la 'bab bar 'gyur te /
translated: And this light falls on the head of these Bodhisattvas at the same time.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de @249b yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul la mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de @249b yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul la mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o //
translated: And these Bodhisattvas are called “anointed with consecration” in the domain of the Perfectly accomplished Buddha.

original: stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs nas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi grangs su 'gro'o zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs nas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi grangs su 'gro'o zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: When the ten powers are complete, they are counted as Perfectly accomplished Buddhas.

original: de ji ltar dbang bskur zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar dbang bskur zhe na /
translated: How are they consecrated?

original: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu thu bo lta bur te /
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu thu bo lta bur te /
translated: Like the eldest son of a Universal Monarch.🔽For what reason?

original: gang gi phyir zhe rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhe rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste /
translated: The son of the Victorious One,

original: dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu thu bo che gzhon nu btsun mo dam pa la btsas pa /
analyzed: dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu thu bo che gzhon nu btsun mo dam pa la btsas pa /
translated: for example, the eldest son of a Universal Monarch, born of a true queen,

original: rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa de la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos lha'i glang po rin po che la gser gyi khri bzang po'i steng du bzhag ste /
analyzed: rgyal po'i mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa de la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos lha'i glang po rin po che la gser gyi khri bzang po'i steng du bzhag ste /
translated: When he is endowed with the name of a king, the cakravartin king places him on a fine golden throne on the precious divine elephant.

original: steng nas bla re bres shing gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang rol mo'i bkod pa rgya chen po byas te /
analyzed: steng nas bla re bres shing gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang rol mo'i bkod pa rgya chen po byas te /
translated: He spreads a canopy above him and makes a vast array of parasols, victory banners, and music.

original: rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las chu blangs pa de gser gyi bum pas bcus te /
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las chu blangs pa de gser gyi bum pas bcus te /
translated: He takes water from the four great oceans and fills a golden vase with it.

original: chu des gzhon nu'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur na de dbang bskur ma thag tu rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste /
analyzed: chu des gzhon nu'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur na de dbang bskur ma thag tu rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ste /
translated: When he consecrates the prince with that water on the crown of his head, as soon as he is consecrated he is counted as a king consecrated on the crown of his head by the king of the warrior class.

original: dge bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs nas ni 'khor los sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo //
analyzed: dge bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs nas ni 'khor los sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo //
translated: After he has completed the path of the ten virtues, he obtains the name cakravartin.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dbang bskur ma thag tu ye shes kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dbang bskur ma thag tu ye shes kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba zhes bya ste /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones, in the same way, as soon as the Bodhisattvas have been empowered by the Blessed Buddhas, they are said to have been empowered by the empowerment of wisdom.

original: stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs nas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi grangs su 'gro'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs nas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi grangs su 'gro'o //
translated: Having perfected the ten powers, they enter the ranks of the Perfectly Enlightened Buddhas.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' bye ba 'bum phrag du ma rtsom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' bye ba 'bum phrag du ma rtsom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones, this is the empowerment of the great wisdom of the Bodhisattvas, for the sake of which many hundreds of thousands of millions of Bodhisattvas undertake [the path].

original: dbang bskur ba dang dus mnyam du sa 'di la rab tu gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: dbang bskur ba dang dus mnyam du sa 'di la rab tu gnas pa yin te /
translated: At the same time as the empowerment, one abides in this ground.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar dbang bskur zhing yon tan dang / ye shes tshad med pa rnam par 'phel ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa'o /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar dbang bskur zhing yon tan dang / ye shes tshad med pa rnam par 'phel ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin la gnas pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa'o /
translated: For this reason, the one who is empowered and whose immeasurable qualities and wisdom increase is said to abide in the Bodhisattva ground Cloud of Dharma.

original: // / de ltar dbang bskur ba thob pas sa rnam par gzhag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar dbang bskur ba thob pas sa rnam par gzhag pa bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the presentation of the stages through the attainment of the consecration,

original: che ba nyid kyi bye brag rnam pa ldas che ba nyid mthar phyin pa dang ldan pa ston te /🔽che ba nyid rnam pa lnga ni shes pa'i che ba nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i che ba nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi che ba nyid dang / gzungs kyi che ba nyid dang / mngon @250a * //
analyzed: che ba nyid kyi bye brag rnam pa ldas che ba nyid mthar phyin pa dang ldan pa ston te / che ba nyid rnam pa lnga ni shes pa'i che ba nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i che ba nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi che ba nyid dang / gzungs kyi che ba nyid dang / mngon @250a * //
translated: he teaches the perfection of greatness through ten aspects of the distinctions of greatness.

original: par shes pa'i che ba nyid do //
analyzed: par shes pa'i che ba nyid do //
translated: The five aspects of greatness are: the greatness of knowledge, the greatness of liberation, the greatness of meditative stabilization, the greatness of retention, and the greatness of superknowledge.

original: de dag ni don rnam pa lnga dang 'brel bar rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de dag ni don rnam pa lnga dang 'brel bar rig par bya ste /
translated: These should be known as connected with five topics.

original: shes bya'i de kho na mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i don dang 'brel ba dang / sems la dbang ba'i don dang 'brel pa dang / don thams cad 'grub pa sems bskyed pa tsam la rag las pa'i don dang 'brel pa dang / 'khor ba ji srid par sems can gyi don bya ba'i rjes 'jug pa dang 'brel pa dang /
analyzed: shes bya'i de kho na mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i don dang 'brel ba dang / sems la dbang ba'i don dang 'brel pa dang / don thams cad 'grub pa sems bskyed pa tsam la rag las pa'i don dang 'brel pa dang / 'khor ba ji srid par sems can gyi don bya ba'i rjes 'jug pa dang 'brel pa dang /
translated: It is related to the meaning of perfect enlightenment with regard to the reality of objects of knowledge, it is related to the meaning of mastery of mind, it is related to the meaning of the accomplishment of all goals depending on the mere generation of the mind, it is related to the pursuit of benefiting sentient beings for as long as samsara exists,

original: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i nus pa dang 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i nus pa dang 'brel pa'o //
translated: and it is related to the ability to ripen sentient beings.

original: shes pa'i che ba nyid kyang rnam pa bdun du rig par bya ste /
analyzed: shes pa'i che ba nyid kyang rnam pa bdun du rig par bya ste /
translated: The greatness of knowledge should also be understood in seven ways:

original: yang dag par 'grub pa shes pa'i che ba nyid dang / sprul pa shes pa'i che ba nyid dang / byin gyis brlabs pa shes pa'i che ba nyid dang / cha phra ba 'jug pa shes pa'i che ba nyid dang / gsang ba'i gnas shes pa'i che ba nyid dang /
analyzed: yang dag par 'grub pa shes pa'i che ba nyid dang / sprul pa shes pa'i che ba nyid dang / byin gyis brlabs pa shes pa'i che ba nyid dang / cha phra ba 'jug pa shes pa'i che ba nyid dang / gsang ba'i gnas shes pa'i che ba nyid dang /
translated: the greatness of knowledge of perfect accomplishment, the greatness of knowledge of emanations, the greatness of knowledge of blessings, the greatness of knowledge of subtle engagement, the greatness of knowledge of secret points,

original: skal ba la 'jug pa shes pa'i che ba nyid dang / lam la 'jug pa shes pa'i che ba nyid do //
analyzed: skal ba la 'jug pa shes pa'i che ba nyid dang / lam la 'jug pa shes pa'i che ba nyid do //
translated: the greatness of knowing how to enter into good fortune, and the greatness of knowing how to enter into the path.

original: de la dang po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la the tshom za ba gcod nus pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: de la dang po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la the tshom za ba gcod nus pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
translated: The first is from the point of view of being able to cut through doubts about omniscience.

original: gnyis pa ni de la gnas pas mngon par sgrub nus pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni de la gnas pas mngon par sgrub nus pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
translated: The second is from the point of view of being able to accomplish it by abiding in that.

original: gsum pa ni de nyid de lta de ltar byed nus pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: gsum pa ni de nyid de lta de ltar byed nus pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
translated: The third is from the point of view of being able to do just that.

original: bzhi pa ni sprul pa dang byin gyi rlabs de gnyi ga la gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kun du 'byung ba'i dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa ni sprul pa dang byin gyi rlabs de gnyi ga la gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kun du 'byung ba'i dbang du byas pa'o //
translated: The fourth is from the point of view of the arising of nondual wisdom in both emanation and transformation.

original: lnga pa ni sems can yongs su ma smin par skrag pa bsal ba'i dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: lnga pa ni sems can yongs su ma smin par skrag pa bsal ba'i dbang du byas pa'o //
translated: The fifth is from the point of view of dispelling the fear of not ripening sentient beings.

original: drug pa ni tshe'i 'du byed byin gyis brlabs pa dang / gtang ba la dbang ba'i dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: drug pa ni tshe'i 'du byed byin gyis brlabs pa dang / gtang ba la dbang ba'i dbang du byas pa'o //
translated: The sixth is from the point of view of blessing the compositional factors of life and mastery over relinquishment.

original: bdun pa ni gnyen po bstan pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
analyzed: bdun pa ni gnyen po bstan pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
translated: The seventh is from the point of view of teaching the antidotes.

original: de la yang dag par 'grub pa shes pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i shes pa yin par rig par bya ste /🔽de yang srid pa'i yan lag gang dag byung bas kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de la yang dag par 'grub pa shes pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i shes pa yin par rig par bya ste / de yang srid pa'i yan lag gang dag byung bas kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur zhing /
translated: One should understand that the knowledge of correct achievement is the knowledge of dependent origination.

original: 'gag pas rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba dang / khams gsum gang du ba dang / sems can gang dag dang / sems gang kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par byang ba dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang dag mi shes pa dang /
analyzed: 'gag pas rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba dang / khams gsum gang du ba dang / sems can gang dag dang / sems gang kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par byang ba dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang dag mi shes pa dang /
translated: Moreover, it is the knowledge of the afflictions that arise from the links of existence and the purification that arises from their cessation, the knowledge of the three realms in which one is born, the knowledge of the sentient beings in which one is born, the knowledge of the mind that is afflicted and purified, the knowledge of the conditioned and unconditioned phenomena that are not known,

original: shes pas dang / nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i yul ji tsam pa dang / dam pa dang dam pa ma yin pa'i chos bstan pa gang gis @250b dang ; mya ngan las 'das pa gang ma thob pa dang / thob pa dang lta ba'i nyes pa gang gis mu stegs can rnams kyis de mi thob pa dang /
analyzed: shes pas dang / nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i yul ji tsam pa dang / dam pa dang dam pa ma yin pa'i chos bstan pa gang gis @250b dang ; mya ngan las 'das pa gang ma thob pa dang / thob pa dang lta ba'i nyes pa gang gis mu stegs can rnams kyis de mi thob pa dang /
translated: the knowledge of the extent of the object that is like space, the knowledge of the teaching of the sublime and nonsublime Dharma by which nirvana is not attained and is attained, and the knowledge of the faults of views by which the tirthikas do not attain nirvana.

original: snod kyi 'jig rten gyi 'byung ba dang / ldog pa gang dag dang / theg pa gsum yang dag par 'grub pa gang yin pa de'i rab tu dbye bas rig par bya ste /
analyzed: snod kyi 'jig rten gyi 'byung ba dang / ldog pa gang dag dang / theg pa gsum yang dag par 'grub pa gang yin pa de'i rab tu dbye bas rig par bya ste /
translated: It should be understood by way of the analysis of the elements of the world-receptacle, their reversal, and the correct establishment of the three vehicles.

original: gang gi phyir kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems de ni chos kyi khams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i sa chos kyi sprin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems de ni chos kyi khams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
translated: O Son of the Victorious Ones, the bodhisattva who is on this bodhisattva ground Cloud of Dharma correctly knows the element of phenomena.

original: 'dod pa'i khams yang dag par 'grub pa dang / gzugs kyi khams yang dag par 'grub pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams yang dag par 'grub pa dang / sems can gyi khams yang dag par 'grub pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams yang dag par 'grub pa dang /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams yang dag par 'grub pa dang / gzugs kyi khams yang dag par 'grub pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams yang dag par 'grub pa dang / sems can gyi khams yang dag par 'grub pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams yang dag par 'grub pa dang /
translated: He correctly establishes the desire realm, the form realm, the formless realm, the element of sentient beings, the element of consciousness,

original: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams yang dag par 'grub pa dang / nam mkha'i khams yang dag par 'grub pa dang / yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa bstan pa'i khams yang dag par 'grub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams yang dag par 'grub pa dang /
analyzed: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi khams yang dag par 'grub pa dang / nam mkha'i khams yang dag par 'grub pa dang / yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin pa bstan pa'i khams yang dag par 'grub pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams yang dag par 'grub pa dang /
translated: the elements of the conditioned and the unconditioned, the element of space, the element of correct and incorrect teachings, the element of nirvāṇa,

original: lta bar gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa yang dag par 'grub pa yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: lta bar gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa yang dag par 'grub pa yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: and the afflictions of the views are all correctly known.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang / 'chags pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang / nyan thos kyi spyod pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa dang / 'chags pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang / nyan thos kyi spyod pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang /
translated: The formation of the world and its destruction, the conduct of the hearers, the conduct of the solitary buddhas, the conduct of the bodhisattvas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / gzugs kyi sku dang / chos kyi sku yang dag par 'grub pa dang / rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'grub pa dang /🔽mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa kun du bstan pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang / mdor na chos thams cad la 'jug cing /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / gzugs kyi sku dang / chos kyi sku yang dag par 'grub pa dang / rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'grub pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa kun du bstan pa yang dag par 'grub pa dang / mdor na chos thams cad la 'jug cing /
translated: the attainment of omniscient knowledge endowed with all aspects,

original: rnam par dbye bas brtag pa yang dag par 'grub pa yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //🔽de la sprul pa shes pa ni sems can du sprul pa la @251a * //
analyzed: rnam par dbye bas brtag pa yang dag par 'grub pa yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o // de la sprul pa shes pa ni sems can du sprul pa la @251a * //
translated: the attainment of manifest complete buddhahood, the turning of the wheel of the Dharma, the demonstration of nirvana, and in brief, the attainment of the investigation and analysis of all phenomena just as they are.

original: sogs pa'i bye brag gis rig par bya ste /
analyzed: sogs pa'i bye brag gis rig par bya ste /
translated: Here, the knowledge of emanation should be understood by way of the distinctions of emanations as sentient beings and so on.

original: gang gi phyir de ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i blos gong du sems can sprul pa'i las yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i blos gong du sems can sprul pa'i las yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
translated: Because, with a mind endowed with such knowledge, he knows the activity of emanations of sentient beings above, just as it is.

original: nyon mongs pas byas pa'i sprul pa dang / lta bar gyur pa'i sprul pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su sprul pa dang / chos kyi dbyings su sprul pa dang / nyan thos su sprul pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su sprul pa dang /
analyzed: nyon mongs pas byas pa'i sprul pa dang / lta bar gyur pa'i sprul pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su sprul pa dang / chos kyi dbyings su sprul pa dang / nyan thos su sprul pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su sprul pa dang /
translated: He knows the emanations created by afflictions, the emanations created by views, the emanations in the world systems, the emanations in the dharma realm, the emanations of śrāvakas, the emanations of pratyekabuddhas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs par sprul pa dang / sprul pa thams cad la rtog pa yang rtog pa med pa nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs par sprul pa dang / sprul pa thams cad la rtog pa yang rtog pa med pa nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: the emanations of bodhisattvas, the emanations of tathāgatas, and all emanations as just non-conceptuality, just as it is.

original: de la nyon mongs pa dang / lta bar gyur pa'i sprul pa ni nyon mongs pa dang / lta bar gyur pa'i sprul pa ston pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de la nyon mongs pa dang / lta bar gyur pa'i sprul pa ni nyon mongs pa dang / lta bar gyur pa'i sprul pa ston pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Here, the emanations created by afflictions and views are those that manifest the emanations created by afflictions and views.

original: chos kyi dbyings su sprul pa ni rnam par gzhag pa'i chos la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings su sprul pa ni rnam par gzhag pa'i chos la 'jug pa'o //
translated: The emanations in the ultimate realm are the engagement with the Dharma that is to be set forth.

original: sprul pa de dag thams cad la yongs su rtog pa rnams rtog pa med pa nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: sprul pa de dag thams cad la yongs su rtog pa rnams rtog pa med pa nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: The correct understanding of the nonconceptuality of all those emanations is the correct understanding of the nonconceptuality of all those emanations.

original: de la byin gyi rlabs zhes pa ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: de la byin gyi rlabs zhes pa ni gang gi phyir /
translated: In this regard, the blessing is as follows.

original: de sangs rgyas su byin gyis brlab pa yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
analyzed: de sangs rgyas su byin gyis brlab pa yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
translated: The correct understanding of the blessing of the Buddha is as follows.

original: chos su byin gyis brlab pa dang / dge 'dun du byin gyis brlab pa dang / las su byin gyis brlab pa dang / nyon mongs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / dus byin gyis brlab pa dang / smon lam byin gyis brlab pa dang /
analyzed: chos su byin gyis brlab pa dang / dge 'dun du byin gyis brlab pa dang / las su byin gyis brlab pa dang / nyon mongs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / dus byin gyis brlab pa dang / smon lam byin gyis brlab pa dang /
translated: The blessing of the Dharma, the blessing of the Saṅgha, the blessing of karma, the blessing of affliction, the blessing of time, the blessing of aspiration, the blessing of the inconceivable, and the blessing of the inconceivable of the inconceivable—

original: mchod pa byin gyis brlab pa dang / spyod pa byin gyis brlab pa dang / bskal pa byin gyis brlab pa dang / ye shes su byin gyis brlab pa yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: mchod pa byin gyis brlab pa dang / spyod pa byin gyis brlab pa dang / bskal pa byin gyis brlab pa dang / ye shes su byin gyis brlab pa yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa ste /
translated: He knows well the consecration of offerings, the consecration of conduct, the consecration of aeons, and the consecration of intuition.

original: mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood as it is taught in the scriptures.

original: de la ye shes su byin gyis brlab pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de la ye shes su byin gyis brlab pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su rig par bya'o //
translated: Therein, the consecration of intuition should be understood as the intuition of omniscience.

original: cha phra ba 'jug pa shes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi cha phra rab 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: cha phra ba 'jug pa shes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi cha phra rab 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste /
translated: Knowledge of the subtle engagement is the knowledge of the Tathagata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Accomplished Buddha, of the engagement of the subtle particles.

original: spyod pa la cha phra ba 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba la cha phra ba 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa dang / bltams pa la cha phra ba 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa la cha phra ba 'jug @251b pa'i mkhyen pa dang /
analyzed: spyod pa la cha phra ba 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba la cha phra ba 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa dang / bltams pa la cha phra ba 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa la cha phra ba 'jug @251b pa'i mkhyen pa dang /
translated: the knowledge of engaging in detail the conduct, the knowledge of engaging in detail the passing away and birth, the knowledge of engaging in detail the birth, the knowledge of engaging in detail the miracles,🔽the knowledge of engaging in detail the renunciation, the knowledge of engaging in detail the manifest complete enlightenment, the knowledge of engaging in detail the turning of the wheel of Dharma, the knowledge of engaging in detail the blessing of the lifespan,

original: mngon par 'byung ba la cha phra ba 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la cha phra ba 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la cha phra ba 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa dang / tshe'i tshang byin gyis brlab pa la cha phra ba 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa dang /
analyzed: mngon par 'byung ba la cha phra ba 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la cha phra ba 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la cha phra ba 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa dang / tshe'i tshang byin gyis brlab pa la cha phra ba 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa dang /
translated: and the knowledge of engaging in detail the passing into nirvana.

original: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la cha phra ba 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa dang / bstan pa gnas pa la cha phra ba 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa de dag thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la cha phra ba 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa dang / bstan pa gnas pa la cha phra ba 'jug pa'i mkhyen pa de dag thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa ste /
translated: He knows all of them just as they are.

original: mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood according to the sutra.

original: de la rnam par 'phrul pa ni gom pa bdun por ba la sogs pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de la rnam par 'phrul pa ni gom pa bdun por ba la sogs pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Here, the miracles are known to be the seven steps and so forth.

original: gsang ba'i gnas shes pa ni de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba'i gnas gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gsang ba'i gnas shes pa ni de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba'i gnas gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste /
translated: The knowledge of the secret places is the secret places of the tathagatas, the arhats, the perfectly enlightened buddhas, which are as follows:

original: sku'i gsang ba dang / gsung gi gsang ba dang / thugs kyi gsang ba dang / dus dang dus ma yin pa rnam par dpyang pa gsang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa gsang ba dang / sems can bsdu ba dang / tshar gcad pa gsang ba dang /
analyzed: sku'i gsang ba dang / gsung gi gsang ba dang / thugs kyi gsang ba dang / dus dang dus ma yin pa rnam par dpyang pa gsang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa gsang ba dang / sems can bsdu ba dang / tshar gcad pa gsang ba dang /
translated: the secret of body, the secret of speech, the secret of mind, the secret of discerning timely and untimely, the secret of the bodhisattva predictions, the secret of attracting and rejecting sentient beings,

original: theg pa tha dad pa gsang ba dang / sems can gyi spyod pa dang / dbang po rnam par dbye ba gsang ba dang / las su bya ba la 'jug pa gsang ba dang / spyod pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
analyzed: theg pa tha dad pa gsang ba dang / sems can gyi spyod pa dang / dbang po rnam par dbye ba gsang ba dang / las su bya ba la 'jug pa gsang ba dang / spyod pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
translated: the secret of the different vehicles, the secret of discerning the conduct and faculties of sentient beings, the secret of engaging in activities, the secret of conduct, complete enlightenment,🔽and the secret of realizing the nature.

original: rang bzhin thugs su chud pa gsang ba de dag thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin thugs su chud pa gsang ba de dag thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa ste /
translated: All of these should be known as they truly are.

original: mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood as it appears in the sutras.

original: bskal pa la 'jug pa shes pa ni de bskal pa la 'jug pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bskal pa la 'jug pa shes pa ni de bskal pa la 'jug pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste /
translated: The knowledge of engaging in eons is as follows.

original: bskal pa gcig la bskal pa grangs med par yang dag par gzhol ba nyid dang / bskal pa grangs med pa la bskal pa grangs med par yang dag par gzhol ba nyid dang / skad cig la bskal pa dang / bskal pa la skad cig tu yang dag par gzhol ba nyid dang /
analyzed: bskal pa gcig la bskal pa grangs med par yang dag par gzhol ba nyid dang / bskal pa grangs med pa la bskal pa grangs med par yang dag par gzhol ba nyid dang / skad cig la bskal pa dang / bskal pa la skad cig tu yang dag par gzhol ba nyid dang /
translated: It is to be absorbed in countless eons in a single eon. It is to be absorbed in a single eon in countless eons. It is to be absorbed in an instant in an eon, and in an eon in an instant.

original: bskal pa la bskal pa ma yin pa dang / bskal pa ma yin pa la bskal par yang dag par gzhol ba nyid dang / sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal pa la sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal par yang dag par @252a * //
analyzed: bskal pa la bskal pa ma yin pa dang / bskal pa ma yin pa la bskal par yang dag par gzhol ba nyid dang / sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal pa la sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal par yang dag par @252a * //
translated: It is to be absorbed in an eon that is not an eon, and in an eon that is not an eon. It is to be absorbed in an eon with buddhas as an eon without buddhas, and in an eon without buddhas as an eon with buddhas.

original: gzhol ba nyid dang / sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal pa la sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal par yang dag par gzhol ba nyid dang / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa la da ltar byung ba dang / 'das pa la ma 'ongs pa dang / 'das pa la da ltar byung ba'i bskal par yang dag par gzhol ba nyid dang /
analyzed: gzhol ba nyid dang / sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal pa la sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i bskal par yang dag par gzhol ba nyid dang / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa la da ltar byung ba dang / 'das pa la ma 'ongs pa dang / 'das pa la da ltar byung ba'i bskal par yang dag par gzhol ba nyid dang /
translated: They are:🔽the past subsumed in the future, the future subsumed in the past, the future subsumed in the present, the present subsumed in the future, the past subsumed in the present, the present subsumed in the past, the long subsumed in the short, the short subsumed in the long, and all kalpas subsumed in a name.

original: bskal pa ring po la bskal pa thung dur yang dag par gzhol ba nyid dang / bskal pa thung du la bskal pa ring por yang dag par gzhol ba nyid dang / bskal pa thams cad la ming du btags par yang dag par gzhol ba nyid de de dag thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: bskal pa ring po la bskal pa thung dur yang dag par gzhol ba nyid dang / bskal pa thung du la bskal pa ring por yang dag par gzhol ba nyid dang / bskal pa thams cad la ming du btags par yang dag par gzhol ba nyid de de dag thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes gsungs pa ste /
translated: They know all of these as they are.

original: mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: This should be understood as it is taught in the sutras.

original: de la yang dag par gzhol ba ni mnyam pa nyid du mos pa yin par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de la yang dag par gzhol ba ni mnyam pa nyid du mos pa yin par rig par bya ste /
translated: And the correct engagement in that is to be understood as the interest in sameness.

original: bskal pa thams cad la phan tshun ming yang dag par gzhol ba nyid du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: bskal pa thams cad la phan tshun ming yang dag par gzhol ba nyid du rab tu shes so //
translated: He fully knows the mutual correct engagement in all kalpas.

original: de la 'jug pa shes pa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa'i dbang du byas pa dang / nga rgyal spyod pa dang / mtho ris la mos pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dpyod pa'i dbang du byas pa ste /
analyzed: de la 'jug pa shes pa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa'i dbang du byas pa dang / nga rgyal spyod pa dang / mtho ris la mos pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dpyod pa'i dbang du byas pa ste /
translated: The knowledge of engagement is from the perspective of the level of ordinary beings, the level of pride, the level of interest in higher rebirth and the level of conceptual analysis.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'jug pa mkhyen pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'jug pa mkhyen pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste /
translated: The knowledge of engagement of the tathagatas, the arhats, the perfectly enlightened buddhas is as follows.

original: byis pa'i lam gyi 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang / zhing gi tshogs mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang / sems can gyi lus dang / sems mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang /
analyzed: byis pa'i lam gyi 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang / rdul phra rab kyi rdul la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang / zhing gi tshogs mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang / sems can gyi lus dang / sems mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang /
translated: It is to know how to enter the path of childish beings. It is to know how to enter the particles of dust. It is to know how to enter the realization of the accumulation of realms. It is to know how to enter the realization of the bodies and minds of sentient beings.

original: thams cad kyi rjes su mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang / snrel zhir spyod pa kun du bstan pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang / mthun pa'i spyod pa kun du bstan pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang / mi mthun pa'i spyod pa kun du bstan pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang /
analyzed: thams cad kyi rjes su mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang / snrel zhir spyod pa kun du bstan pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang / mthun pa'i spyod pa kun du bstan pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang / mi mthun pa'i spyod pa kun du bstan pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang /
translated: It is to know how to enter the realization of all. It is to know how to enter the teaching of the conduct of the straight. It is to know how to enter the teaching of the conduct of the even. It is to know how to enter the teaching of the conduct of the uneven.

original: bsam du rung ba dang / bsam du mi rung ba dang / 'jig rten gyis rnam par shes par rung ba dang / rnam par shes par mi rung ba'i spyod pa kun du bstan pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang / nyan thos kyis rnam par shes par bya ba dang /
analyzed: bsam du rung ba dang / bsam du mi rung ba dang / 'jig rten gyis rnam par shes par rung ba dang / rnam par shes par mi rung ba'i spyod pa kun du bstan pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa dang / nyan thos kyis rnam par shes par bya ba dang /
translated: He knows how to engage in teaching the conduct that is suitable to be contemplated and that which is not suitable to be contemplated, that which is knowable to the world and that which is not knowable to the world, and that which is knowable to the śrāvakas,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyis rnam par shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpas rnam par shes par @252b bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par mkhyen par bya ba'i spyod pa kun du bstan pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa de dag thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyis rnam par shes par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpas rnam par shes par @252b bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par mkhyen par bya ba'i spyod pa kun du bstan pa la 'jug pa mkhyen pa de dag thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: that which is knowable to the pratyekabuddhas, that which is knowable to the bodhisattvas, and that which is knowable to the tathāgatas.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mkhyen pa yangs shing tshad med pas sa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jug pa shes pa yang tshad med do zhes gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mkhyen pa yangs shing tshad med pas sa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jug pa shes pa yang tshad med do zhes gsungs pa ste /
translated: “ O son of the victors, in this way, the bodhisattvas who abide on this bhūmi engage in immeasurable knowledge through the immeasurable knowledge of the blessed buddhas.”

original: mdo las ji skad du 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mdo las ji skad du 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood as it is taught in the sutra.

original: de ltar shes pa'i che ba nyid rnam pa bdun bstan nas rnam par thar pa'i che ba nyid ston to //
analyzed: de ltar shes pa'i che ba nyid rnam pa bdun bstan nas rnam par thar pa'i che ba nyid ston to //
translated: Having taught the seven kinds of greatness of knowledge, he teaches the greatness of the liberations.

original: de la rnam par thar pa'i che ba nyid rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyi dbang du byas pa ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: de la rnam par thar pa'i che ba nyid rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyi dbang du byas pa ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The greatness of the liberations in terms of the domain of miracles is as follows.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'di dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de /
translated: O son of the victors, the bodhisattva who possesses this bodhisattva stage

original: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba 'thob bo zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba 'thob bo zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: attains the bodhisattva liberation called “inconceivable.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams dang / 'gro ba mtha' yas par smon nas shes pa thogs pa med pa nyid ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams dang / 'gro ba mtha' yas par smon nas shes pa thogs pa med pa nyid ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The unobstructed knowledge of infinite world systems and beings through aspiration is as follows.

original: sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: Because of that, it is called “unobstructed.

original: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i nyan thos la sogs pa'i rnam par grol ba shes pa ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa slob pa dang / mi slob pa'i nyan thos la sogs pa'i rnam par grol ba shes pa ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The knowledge of the liberation of mundane and supramundane disciples and non-disciples is called

original: rnam par dag pa rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: the knowledge of the discernment of purification.

original: dngos po ci 'dod dgur bsgyur ba ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: dngos po ci 'dod dgur bsgyur ba ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The transformation of things into whatever one desires is called

original: sgo kun du snang ba zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: sgo kun du snang ba zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: the knowledge of the appearance in all directions.

original: chos kyi gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: chos kyi gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The Dharma dhāraṇī is called

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod ces bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod ces bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: the treasure of the Tathāgatas.

original: phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcad pa'i gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcad pa'i gzungs ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The dhāraṇī of defeating opponents is called

original: 'khor lo thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: the wheel that is unimpeded.

original: dus gsum gyi bskal pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byin gyis rlob pa ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi bskal pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byin gyis rlob pa ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The blessing of the three times according to one's desire is called

original: dus gsum gyi rjes su song ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: dus gsum gyi rjes su song ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: the knowledge of the three times.

original: chos thams cad kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rnam pa thams cad shes pa ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rnam pa thams cad shes pa ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The knowledge of all the aspects of the dependent origination of all phenomena is the reason why

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po can zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po can zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: it is called the essence of the realm of phenomena.

original: lus med cing snang ba tsam gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: lus med cing snang ba tsam gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The pervasiveness of the mere appearance without a body is the reason why

original: rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor snang ba zhes gsungs pa'o //🔽'jig rten gyi khams du ma'i sems can gyi sems @253a * //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor snang ba zhes gsungs pa'o // 'jig rten gyi khams du ma'i sems can gyi sems @253a * //
translated: it is called the appearance of the mandala of liberation.🔽The simultaneous knowledge of the minds of sentient beings in many world systems should also be understood as being

original: cig car shes pa'i dbang du byas par yang rig par bya ste /
analyzed: cig car shes pa'i dbang du byas par yang rig par bya ste /
translated: under the power of the knowledge of the minds of others.

original: gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yul ma lus pa zhes bya ba thob ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yul ma lus pa zhes bya ba thob ste /
translated: The reason why it is called the knowledge of the minds of others is that🔽it is the knowledge of the minds of sentient beings in many world systems.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo bcu po de dag la sogs pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'bum phrag grangs med pa dpag tu med pa🔽dag 'thob bo zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo bcu po de dag la sogs pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'bum phrag grangs med pa dpag tu med pa dag 'thob bo zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: O son of the victors, the bodhisattva who is on this tenth bodhisattva stage attains immeasurable, countless hundreds of thousands of bodhisattva doors of liberation, beginning with these ten doors of liberation.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi che ba nyid ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi che ba nyid ni gang gi phyir /
translated: The greatness of his meditative absorption is stated in the passage that says,

original: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin 'bum zhes gsungs pa'o //🔽gzungs che ba nyid ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin 'bum zhes gsungs pa'o // gzungs che ba nyid ni gang gi phyir /
translated: Similarly, he attains hundreds of thousands of meditative absorptions.

original: gzungs 'bum zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: gzungs 'bum zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: The greatness of his retention is stated in the passage that says,🔽He attains hundreds of thousands of retentions.

original: mngon par shes pa'i che ba nyid ni gang gi phyir /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa'i che ba nyid ni gang gi phyir /

analyzed: khong du chud par bya'o //
